name: Albus Dumbledore

name: Albus Dumbledore

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Professor Dumbledore, Sir. Professor McGonagall.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: No problems, I trust, Hagrid?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No, sir. Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol. Heh. Try not to wake him. There you go.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Albus, do you really think it's safe, leaving him with these people? I've watched them all day. They're the worst sort of Muggles imaginable. They really are...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: The only family he has.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: This boy will be famous. There won't be a child in our world who doesn't know his name.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Exactly. He's better off growing up away from all that. Until he is ready.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: There, there, Hagrid. It's not really goodbye, after all.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Good luck...Harry Potter.

name: Petunia Dursley

line: Wake up, cousin! We're going to the zoo!

name: Petunia Dursley

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Why don't you just cook the breakfast, and try not to burn anything.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, Aunt Petunia.

name: Petunia Dursley

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Hurry up! Bring my coffee, boy!

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, Uncle Vernon.

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Aren't they wonderful, darling?

name: Vernon Dursley

name: Vernon Dursley

name: Petunia Dursley
line: Oh, now, now, now. This is what we're going to do, is that when we go out, we're going to buy you two new presents! How's that, pumpkin?

name: Petunia Dursley
line: This will be a lovely day at the zoo. I'm really looking forward to it.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: I'm warning you now, boy. Any funny business, any at all, and you won't have any meals for a week. Get in.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Make it move.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Move!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: MOVE!

name: Harry Potter
line: He's asleep!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: He's boring.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sorry about him. He doesn't understand what it's like, lying there day after day, having people press their ugly faces in on you.  Can you...hear me?  It's just...I've never talked to a snake before. Do you...I mean...do you talk to people often?  You're from Burma, aren't you? Was it nice there, do you miss your family?  I see. That's me as well. I never knew my parents, either.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Whoa! Ahh! Ahh!!

name: Petunia Dursley
line: AHH!

name: Petunia Dursley
line: It's all right. It's all right.

name: Harry Potter
line: Ow!

line: What happened?!

name: Harry Potter
line: I swear I don't know!  One minute, the glass was there and then it was gone! It was like magic!

line: There's no such thing as magic!

name: Petunia Dursley

name: Harry Potter
line: Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts' School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Isn't it wonderful? I was the only one to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you'd be just the same, just as strange, just as ... abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up. And we got landed with you.

name: Garrick Ollivander
line: Oh, we do not speak his name. The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why, but I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you. After all, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named did great things...terrible, yes, but great.

name: Harry Potter

line: Well, some say he died. Codswallop in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there, still, too tired to go on. But one thing's absolutely certain. Something about you stumped him that night. That's why you're famous. That's why everybody knows your name. You're the boy who lived.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: What're you looking at?  Blimey, is that the time? Sorry, Harry, I'm gonna have to leave you. Dumbledore'll be wanting his- well, he'll be wanting to see me. Now, uh, your train leaves in 10 minutes. Here's your ticket.  Stick to it, Harry that's very important. Stick to your ticket.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Welcome to Hogwarts. Now, in a few moments, you will pass through these doors and join your classmates. But before you can take your seats, you must be sorted into your houses. Any rule breaking, and you will lose points. At the end of the year, the house with the most points is awarded the house cup.

line: There will be no foolish wand waving or silly incantations in this class. As such, I don't expect many of you to appreciate the subtle science and exact art that is potion making. However, for those select few...  who possess the predisposition, I can teach you how to bewitch the mind and ensnare the senses. I can tell you how to bottle fame, brew glory and even put a stopper...  in death.  Then again, maybe some of you have come to Hogwarts in possession of abilities so formidable that you feel confidant enough to not...pay...attention.  Mr. Potter. Our...new...celebrity. Tell me, what would I get if I added powdered root of asphodel to an infusion of wormwood?  You don't know? Well, let's try again. Where, Mr. Potter, would you look if I asked you to find me a bezoar?

A bezoar is a stone taken from the stomach of a goat and it will save you from most poisons. As for monkshood and wolfsbane, they are the same plant, which also goes by the name of aconite.  Well?  Why aren't you all copying this down?  And Gryffindors, note that five points, will be taken from your house... for your classmate's cheek.

Gilderoy Lockhart, Order of Merlin, Third Class, Honorary Member of the Dark Force Defense League, and five-times winner of Witch Weekly's Most-Charming-Smile Award- but I don't talk about that. I didn't get rid of the Bandon Banshee by smiling at him. Huh, huh, huh...  hee, hee...  Now- be warned! It is my job to arm you against the foulest creatures known to wizardkind. You may find yourselves facing your worst fears in this room. Know only that no harm can befall you whilst I am here. I must ask you not to scream. It might...  provoke them!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: We will be able to cure her, Argus. As I understand it, Madame Sprout has a very healthy growth of Mandrakes. When matured, a potion will be made which will revive Mrs. Norris. And in the meantime, I strongly recommend caution...  to all.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Could I have your attention, please? Right. Now, today, we will be transforming animals into water goblets. Like so. One, two, three, Vera verto. Now it's your turn. Well, who would like to go first? Ah! Mr. Weasley. "One, two, three. Vera verto."

name: Hermione Granger
line: Professor, I was wondering if you could tell us about... the Chamber of Secrets?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Well, very well. Well, you all know, of course, that Hogwarts was founded over a thousand years ago by the four greatest witches and wizards of the age: Godric Gryffindor, Helga Hufflepuff, Rowena Ravenclaw, and Salazar Slytherin. Now, three of the founders coexisted quite harmoniously. One did not.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Three guesses who.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Salazar Slytherin wished to be more selective about the students admitted to Hogwarts. He believed magical learning should be kept within all-magic families. In other words, "pure-bloods." Unable to sway the others, he decided to leave the school. Now, according to legend, Slytherin had built a hidden chamber in this castle, known as the Chamber of Secrets. Though, shortly before departing, he sealed it until that time when his own true heir returned to the school. The heir alone would be able to open the Chamber and unleash the horror within, and by so doing purge the school of all those who, in Slytherin's view, were unworthy to study magic.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Muggle-borns.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Well, naturally, the school had been searched many times. No such chamber has been found.

name: Hermione Granger

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Well, the Chamber is said to home to something that only the Heir of Slytherin can control. It is said to be the home of a monster.

line: Gather 'round, gather 'round! Can everybody see me? Can you all hear me? Excellent! line: I don't know, Harry, but it sounded like you were egging the snake on, or something. Harry, listen to me. There's a reason the symbol of Slytherin House is a serpent. Salazar Slytherin was a Parselmouth. He could talk to snakes, too.

line: Everything's set. We just need a bit of who you're changing into.

line: Crabbe and Goyle.

name: Hermione Granger
line: We also need to make sure that the real Crabbe and Goyle can't burst in on us while we're interrogating Malfoy.

name: Ron Weasley
line: How?

name: Hermione Granger
line: I've got it all worked out. I filled these with a simple Sleeping Draught. Simple, but powerful. Now, once they're asleep hide them in the broomstick cupboard and pull out a few of their hairs, and put on their uniforms.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Whose hair are you ripping out then?

name: Hermione Granger
line: I've already got mine. Millicent Bulstrode, Slytherin- I got this off her robes. I'm going to go check on the Polyjuice Potion. Make sure that Crabbe and Goyle find these.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ahem...

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron, maybe I should do it?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Yeah. Right.

name: Harry Potter
line: Wingardium leviosa. Here they come.

name: Vincent Crabbe
line: It's good right? Ah...  Cool!

name: Vincent Crabbe
line: Ummm... um.

name: Gregory Goyle
line: Ummm... um.

name: Ron Weasley
line: How thick could you get?

name: Harry Potter
line: Come on. Let's get 'em.

name: Hermione Granger
line: We'll have exactly one hour before we change back into ourselves...  Add the hairs.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ugh- essence of Crabbe.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Cheers!

name: Ron Weasley
line: I think I'm gonna be sick!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Me too.

name: Harry Potter
line: Ughh!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Uh...  Harry?

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Bloody hell!

name: Harry Potter
line: We still sound like ourselves. You need to sound more like Crabbe.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Uh...  Bloody hell.

name: Harry Potter
line: Excellent.

name: Ron Weasley
line: But where's Hermione?

name: Hermione Granger
line: I- I don't think I'm going. You go on without me!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione, are you okay?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Just go. You're wasting time!

name: Harry Potter
line: Come on.

name: Harry Potter
line: I think the Slytherin common room's this way.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Okay.

name: Percy Weasley
line: Excuse me.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What are you doing d- uh, I mean...  What are you doing down here?

name: Percy Weasley
line: I happen to be a school prefect. You, on the other hand, have no business wandering the corridors at this time of night. What are your names again?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Uhh...

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Crabbe, Goyle! Where have you two been? Pigging out in the Great Hall all this time? Why are you wearing glasses?

name: Harry Potter
line: Ah- um...  Reading.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Reading?

name: Harry Potter
line: Uh-huh.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: I didn't know you could read. And what are you doing down here, Weasley?

name: Percy Weasley
line: Mind your attitude, Malfoy.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Well, sit down. You'd never know the Weasleys were pure-bloods, the way they behave. They're an embarrassment to the wizarding world. All of them. What's wrong with you, Crabbe?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ahem... Stomachache.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: You know, I'm surprised that the Daily Prophet hasn't done a report on all these attacks. I suppose Dumbledore is trying to hush it all up. Father always said Dumbledore was the worst thing that ever happened to this place.

name: Harry Potter
line: You're wrong!

name: Draco Malfoy
line: What? You think there's someone here who's worse than Dumbledore?

name: Harry Potter
line: Harry Potter?

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Good one, Goyle. You're absolutely right. Saint Potter. And people actually think that he's the Heir of Slytherin!

name: Harry Potter
line: But then you must have some idea who's behind it all.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: You know I don't Goyle. I told you yesterday. How many times do I have to tell you? Is this yours? But my father did say this: It's been fifty years since the Chamber was opened. He wouldn't tell me who opened it-- only that they were expelled. The last time the Chamber of Secrets was opened, a Mudblood died. So, it's only a matter of time before one of them is killed this time. As for me, I hope it's Granger. What's the matter with you two? You're acting very... odd.

name: Harry Potter
line: It's his...  stomachache. Calm down.

name: Ron Weasley
line: S- scar.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hair!

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Hey! Where are you going?

name: Ron Weasley
line: That was close!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione, come out. We've got loads to tell you!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Go away!

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Ahh! Wait till you see. It's awful! He- ha, ha, he- hee!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione? A- are you OK?

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Aaah!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Do you remember me telling you that the Polyjuice Potion was only for human transformations? It was cat's hair I plucked off Millicent Bulstrode's robes. Look at my face.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Hee, ha, ha!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Look at your tail!

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Ha, ha, ha!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Have you spoken to Hermione?

name: Harry Potter
line: She should be out of hospital in a few days, when she stops coughing up fur balls...  What's this?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Yuck!

name: Harry Potter
line: Looks like Moaning Myrtle's flooded the bathroom.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Oooh, oooh, ooooh, huh, huh. Come to throw something else at me?

name: Harry Potter
line: Why would I throw something at you?

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Don't ask me! Here I am, minding my own business, and someone thinks it's funny to throw a book at me.

name: Ron Weasley
line: But, it can't hurt if someone throws something at you. I mean, it'll just go right through you.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Sure! Let's all throw books at Myrtle because she can't feel it! Ten points if you get through her stomach! Fifty points if it goes through her head!

name: Harry Potter
line: But, who threw it at you, anyway?

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: I don't know, I didn't see them. I was just sitting in the Ubend thinking about death - aah - and it fell through the top of my head. Uhhuh. Whoo-oooh-whoooo...

name: Harry Potter
line: 'Tom Marvolo Riddle.'

name: Harry Potter
line: 'My name is Harry Potter.'

name: Diary
line: Hello Harry Potter, my name is Tom Riddle.

name: Harry Potter
line: 'Do you know anything about the Chamber of Secrets?'

name: Diary
line: Yes.

name: Harry Potter
line: 'Can you tell me?'

name: Diary
line: No. But I can show you. Let me take you back fifty years ago...

name: Harry Potter
line: Excuse me. Could you tell me what's going on here? Are you Tom Riddle?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Riddle! Come.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Professor Dumbledore.

name: Harry Potter
line: Dumbledore?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: It is not wise to be wandering around this late hour, Tom.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Yes, Professor. I- I suppose I- I had to see for myself if the rumors were true.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I'm afraid they are, Tom. They are true.

name: Tom Riddle
line: About the school, as well? I don't have a home to go to. They wouldn't really close Hogwarts, would they Professor?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I understand Tom, but I'm afraid Headmaster Dippet may have no choice.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Sir- if it all stopped- if the person responsible was caught--

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Is there something you wish to tell me?

name: Tom Riddle
line: No, sir. Nothing.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Very well, then. Off you go.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Good night, sir.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Let's get yeh out of there.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Evening, Hagrid. I'm going to have to turn you in, Hagrid. I don't think you meant it to kill anyone, but--

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: You can't! You don't understand.

name: Tom Riddle
line: The dead girl's parents will be here tomorrow. The least Hogwarts can do is make sure the thing that killed their daughter is slaughtered.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: It wasn't him. Aragog never killed no one! Never!

name: Tom Riddle
line: Monsters don't make good pets, Hagrid. Now, stand aside.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No!

name: Tom Riddle
line: Stand aside, Hagrid!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No!

name: Tom Riddle
line: Cistem aperio! Arania exumai!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Aragog! Aragog!

name: Tom Riddle
line: I can't let you go. They'll have your wand for this, Hagrid. You'll be expelled.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid! Haagriid!

name: Harry Potter
line: Woah!

name: Harry Potter
line: It was Hagrid. Hagrid opened the Chanter of Secrets fifty years ago.

name: Hermione Granger
line: It can't be Hagrid. It just can't be.

name: Ron Weasley
line: We don't even know this Tom Riddle. He sounds like a dirty, rotten snitch to me.

name: Harry Potter
line: The monster had killed somebody, Ron. What would any of us have done?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Look. Hagrid's our friend. Why don't we just go and ask him about it?

name: Ron Weasley
line: That'll be a cheerful visit! "Hello, Hagrid! Tell us, have you been setting anything mad and hairy loose in the castle lately?"

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Mad and hairy? You wouldn't be talking about me now, would ya?

name: Harry Potter
line: No!

name: Ron Weasley
line: No!

name: Hermione Granger
line: No!

name: Harry Potter
line: W- what's that you've got, Hagrid?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, It's a- Flesh-Eatin' Slug Repellent. For the Mandrakes, ya know. Now, accordin' to Professor Sprout, they've still got a bit o' growing up to do. But, once their acne's cleared up, we'll be able to chop 'em up and stew 'em, and then we'll get those people down at the hospital un-Petrified. In the meantime, though, you three had best be lookin' after yourselves. All right? Hmm.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Hello, Neville!

name: Neville Longbottom
line: Harry- I don't know who did it, but you'd better come! Come on!

name: Hermione Granger
line: It had to be a Gryffindor. Nobody else knows our password- unless it wasn't a student.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Who ever it was, they must have been looking for something.

name: Harry Potter
line: And they found it. Tom Riddle's diary is gone.

name: Oliver Wood
line: Alright, listen up. We play our game, Hufflepuff doesn't stand a

name: Fred Weasley
line: And not to mention, they're dead scared that Harry'll Petrify them if they fly anywhere near him.

name: Oliver Wood
line: Well, that too. Professor McGonagall.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: This match has been cancelled.

name: Oliver Wood
line: We can't cancel Quidditch.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Silence, Wood. You and your teammates will go to Gryffindor Tower, now. Potter, you and I will find Mr. Weasley. There's something the both of you have to see.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: I warn you, this could be a wee bit of a shock.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hermione!

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: She was found near the Library, along with this. Does it mean anything to either of you?

name: Harry Potter
line: No.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Could I have your attention please? Because of recent events, these new rules will be put into effect immediately. "All students will return to their house common rooms by six o'clock every evening. All students will be escorted to each lesson by a teacher. No exceptions." I should tell you this: unless the culprit behind these attacks is caught, it is likely the school will be closed.

name: Harry Potter
line: We've got to talk to Hagrid, Ron. I can't believe it's him, but if he did set the monster loose last time, he'll know how to get inside the Chamber of Secrets, and that's a start.

name: Ron Weasley
line: But you heard McGonagall! We're not allowed to leave the tower except for class.

name: Harry Potter
line: I think it's time to get my Dad's old cloak out again.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Who's there? Hello? Hello?

name: Harry Potter
line: What's that for?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, nothing. I- I was expecting, ah...  It doesn't matter- come on inI just made a pot o' tea.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid, are you okay?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: I'm fine! I'm alright.

name: Harry Potter
line: Did you hear about Hermione?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, yeah. I heard about that, all righ'.

name: Harry Potter
line: Look, we have to ask you something. Do you know who's opened the Chamber of Secrets?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: What you had to understand about that is  Quick under the cloak. Don't say a word. Be quiet, both o' you...  Professor Dumbledore, sir!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Good evening, Hagrid. I wonder, could we... ?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Of course! Come in! Come in.

name: Ron Weasley
line: That's Dad's boss! Cornelius Fudge, Minister of Magic!

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Bad business, Hagrid. Very bad business. Had to come-- three attacks on Muggle-borns. Things have gone far enough. The Ministry's got to act.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, but I never- you know I never, Professor!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I want it understood, Cornelius, that Hagrid has my full confidence.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Albus look, Hagrid's record is against him. I've got to take him.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Take me? Take me where? Not Azkaban Prison?

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: I'm afraid we have no choice, Hagrid.

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: Already here, Fudge? Good...

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: What're you doin' here? Get outta my house!

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: Believe me, I take absolutely no pleasure being inside your-- you call this a house? Huh! No. I simply called at the school, and was told the headmaster was here.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Well, what exactly is it that you want with me?

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: The other governors and I have decided it's time for you to step aside. This is an order of suspension. You'll find all twelve signatures on it. I'm afraid we feel you've rather lost your touch. Well, what, with all these attacks, there'll be no Muggle-borns left at Hogwarts. I can only imagine what an awful loss that would be to the school.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Yeh can' take Professor Dumbledore away. Take him away, an' the Muggle-borns won' stand a chance! You mark my words, there'll be killin's next!

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: You think so?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Calm yourself, Hagrid. If the governors desire my removal, I will, of course, step aside. However, you will find that help will always be given at Hogwarts to those who ask for it.

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: Admirable sentiments. Shall we? Fudge!

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Come, Hagrid...  Well?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Ahem! If, uh, if anybody was looking for some stuff, then all they'd have to do would be to follow the spiders. Yup! That would lead them right! That's all I have to say. Oh, and someone'll need to feed Fang while I'm away.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Good boy.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hagrid's right! With Dumbledore gone, there'll be an attack a day!

name: Harry Potter
line: Look! Well, come on. Come on, Fang!

name: Ron Weasley
line: What?!

name: Harry Potter
line: You heard what Hagrid said; 'Follow the spiders.'

name: Ron Weasley
line: They're headed to the Dark Forest! Why spiders! Why couldn't it be "follow the butterflies?"

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry, I don't like this...  Harry, I don't like this at all!

name: Harry Potter
line: Shush!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Can we go back now?

name: Harry Potter
line: Come on!

name: Aragog
line: Who is it?

name: Harry Potter
line: Don't panic.

name: Aragog
line: Hagrid? Is that you?

name: Harry Potter
line: We're friends of Hagrid's. And you? Y- y-you're Aragog aren't you?

name: Aragog
line: Yes. Hagrid has never sent men into our hollow before.

name: Harry Potter
line: He's in trouble. Up at the school, there have been attacks. They think it's Hagrid. They think he opened the Chamber of Secrets, like before.

name: Aragog
line: That's a lie! Hagrid never opened the Chamber of Secrets.

name: Harry Potter
line: Then you're not the monster.

name: Aragog
line: No! The monster was born in the castle. I came to Hagrid from a distant land, in the pocket of a traveler.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Shush. But if you're not the monster, then- then what did kill that girl fifty years ago?

name: Aragog
line: We do not speak of it. It is an ancient creature we spiders fear above all others.

name: Harry Potter
line: But have you seen it?

name: Aragog
line: I never saw any part of the castle but the box in which Hagrid kept me. The girl was discovered in a bathroom. When I was accused, Hagrid brought me here.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry!

name: Harry Potter
line: What?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ahh- hhh...

name: Harry Potter
line: Well, thank you. We'll just... go.

name: Aragog
line: Go? I think not. My sons and daughters do not harm Hagrid on my command. But I cannot deny them fresh meat when it wanders so willingly into our midst. Good-bye, friend of Hagrid.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Can we panic now?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Know any spells?

name: Harry Potter
line: One, but it's not powerful enough for all of them.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Where's Hermione when you need her?

name: Harry Potter
line: Let's go! Arania exumai! Go!

name: Harry Potter
line: Whoah!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Whoah!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Glad we're out of there! Ah- Aaaah!

name: Harry Potter
line: Arania exumai!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Thanks for that.

name: Harry Potter
line: Don't mention it. Get us out of here. Now! Come on! Come on! Move faster!

name: Harry Potter
line: Aah!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Aah!

name: Harry Potter
line: Go on! Go! Get us in the air.

name: Ron Weasley
line: The flying gear's jammed!

name: Harry Potter
line: Come on! Pull!

name: Ron Weasley
line: I'm trying!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Follow the spiders! Follow the spiders! If Hagrid ever gets out of Azkaban, I'll kill him! I mean, what was the point of sending us in there? What have we found out?

name: Harry Potter
line: We know one thing. Hagrid never opened the Chamber of Secrets. He was innocent.

name: Harry Potter
line: Wish you were here Hermione. We need you...  now, more than ever.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What's that?

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron, this is why Hermione was in the Library the day she was attacked. Come on!

name: Harry Potter
line: 'Of the many fearsome beasts that roam our land, none is more deadly than the basilisk. Capable of living for hundreds of years, instant death awaits any who meet this giant serpent's eye. Spiders flee before it.' Ron, this is it. The monster in the Chamber of Secrets is a basilisk. That's why I can hear it speak. It's a snake!

name: Ron Weasley
line: But if it kills by looking people in the eye, why is it no one's dead?

name: Harry Potter
line: Because no one did look it in the eye. Not directly, at least. Colin saw it through his camera. Justin... Justin must have seen the basilisk through Nearly Headless Nick. Nick got the full blast of it- but he's a ghost- he couldn't die again. And Hermione... had the mirror. I bet you anything she was using it to look around corners, in case it came along.

name: Ron Weasley
line: And Mrs. Norris? I'm pretty sure she didn't have a camera or a mirror, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: The water. There was water on the floor that night. She only saw the basilisk's reflection. 'Spiders flee before it.' It all fits!

name: Ron Weasley
line: But how's a basilisk been getting around? A dirty great snake- someone would have seen it.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione's answered that, too.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Pipes? It's using the plumbing!

name: Harry Potter
line: Remember what Aragog said, about that girl fifty years ago? She died in a bathroom? What if she never left?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Moaning Myrtle.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: All students are to return to their house dormitories at once. All teachers to the second floor corridor, immediately.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: As you can see, the Heir of Slytherin has left another message. Our worst fear has been realized. A student has been taken by the monster into the Chamber itself. The students must be sent home. I'm afraid this is the end of Hogwarts.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: So sorry- dozed off- what have I missed?

name: Severus Snape
line: A girl has been snatched by the monster, Lockhart. Your moment has come, at last.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: My m-moment?

name: Severus Snape
line: Weren't you saying just last night that you've known all along where the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets is?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Well, that's settled. We'll leave you to deal with the monster, Gilderoy. Your skills, after all, are a legend.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Very well- ah- I'll just be in my office getting, umgetting ready.

name: Poppy Pomfrey
line: Who is it that the monster's taken, Minerva?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Ginny Weasley.

name: Ron Weasley
line: 'Her skeleton will lie in the chamber forever.' Ginny...

name: Harry Potter
line: Lockhart may be useless, but he's going to try and get into the Chamber. At least we can tell him what we know.

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor, we have some information for you! Are you going somewhere?

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Uh, ah- well, yes- um, urgent call- unavoidable- got to go.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What about my sister?!

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Well, um- as to that, most unfortunate. No one regrets more than I.

name: Ron Weasley
line: You're the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher! You can't go now!

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Well- I must say- when I took the job there was nothing in the job description about a...

name: Harry Potter
line: You're running away? After all that stuff you did in your books?

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Books can be misleading!

name: Harry Potter
line: You wrote them!

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: My dear boy, do use your common sense! My books wouldn't have sold half as well if people didn't think I'd done all those things!

name: Harry Potter
line: You're a fraud! You've just been taking credit for what other wizards have done!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Is there anything you can do?

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Yes, now you mention it. I'm rather gifted with Memory Charms. Otherwise, you see, all those wizards would have gone blabbing. And I'd never have sold another book. In fact, ah... I'm ah... going to have to do the same to you.

name: Harry Potter
line: Don't even think about it.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Oh! Who's there? Oh! Hello, Harry! Ron. What do you want?

name: Harry Potter
line: To ask you how you died.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Oh! It was dreadful. It happened right here in this very cubicle. I'd hidden because Olive Hornby was teasing me about my glasses. I was crying, and then I heard somebody come in.

name: Harry Potter
line: Who was it Myrtle?

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: I don't know. I was Distraught! Huhh-huh... But they said something funny, a kind of made up language. And I realized it was a boy speaking, so I unlocked the door to tell him to go away and...  I died.

name: Harry Potter
line: Just like that? How?

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: I just remember seeing a pair of great big yellow eyes... over there, by that sink. Ohhhhooo...

name: Harry Potter
line: This is it. This is it, Ron. I think this is the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Say something. Harry, say something in Parseltongue!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hesha- Hassah.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Excellent, Harry. Haa! Good work! Well then, I'll just be, ah...  There's no need for me to stay.

name: Harry Potter
line: Oh, yes there is! You first.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Now, boys what good will it do?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Better you than us.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: Um... but... obviously, yes. Sure you don't want to test it first? No! Aaaah! It's really quite filthy down here.

name: Harry Potter
line: All right. Let's go.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Oh, Harry? If you die down there, you're welcome to share my toilet. Hee, hee.

name: Harry Potter
line: Uh... thanks Myrtle.

name: Harry Potter
line: Aaah!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Aaah!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Ugh!

name: Harry Potter
line: Now remember, any sign of movement, close your eyes straightaway.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Go on.

name: Harry Potter
line: This way.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What's this?

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: It looks like a...  snake.

name: Harry Potter
line: It's a snakeskin.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Bloody hell. Whatever shed this must be sixty feet long-- or more! Heart of a lion, this one.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
line: The adventure ends here, boys. But don't fret. The world will know our story. How I was too late to save the girl. How you two tragically lost your minds at the sight of her mangled body. So, you first, Mr. Potter. Say good-bye to your memories. Obliviate!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry! Harry!

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron! Ron, are you ok?

name: Ron Weasley

line: Bloody hell, Harry. That was not funny.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Those weasels! Never told me about any Marauder's Map.

name: Hermione Granger
line: But Harry isn't going to keep it. He's going to turn it over to Professor McGonagall. Aren't you?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Sure. Along with his Invisibility Cloak.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Oh, Look who it is. Madam Rosmerta. Ron fancies her.

name: Ron Weasley
line: That's not true!

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Professor McGonagall!

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Cornelius!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Allow me, minister.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Oh, Hagrid...

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Sorry about that.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Rosmerta, my dear. I hope business is good.

name: Rosmerta
line: It'd be a lot better if the Ministry wasn't sending dementors... into my pub every other night!

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: We have... We have a killer on the loose!

name: Rosmerta
line: Sirius Black in Hogsmeade! And what would bring him here?

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Harry Potter.

name: Rosmerta
line: Harry Potter?

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Come.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry!

name: Shrunken head
line: No underage wizards allowed in today! Shut the damn door!

name: Hermione Granger
line: So rude.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Thick heads.

name: Shrunken head
line: Thick heads?! How dare they! Who are they calling thick heads? Young whippersnappers!

name: Rosmerta
line: Nobody's going to come to a pub where they're gonna get scared out of their wits. Why?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Professor Dumbledore does not want dementors around the place, I can assure you.

name: Rosmerta
line: Now, tell me what this is all about.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Well. Now years ago, when Harry Potter's parents realized they were marked for death... You remember? They went into hiding. Few knew where they were. One who did was Sirius Black. And he told You-Know-Who!

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Not only did Black lead You-Know-Who to the Potters that night, but he also killed one of their friends, Peter Pettigrew!

name: Rosmerta
line: Peter Pettigrew?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Yes, little lump of a boy. Always trailing after Sirius Black.

name: Rosmerta
line: Ah, I remember him. Never let James and Sirius out of his sight. But what happened?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Well Peter Pettigrew tried to warn the Potters... and might have managed to, had he not run into an old friend, Sirius Black.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Black was vicious. He didn't kill Pettigrew. He destroyed him! A finger. That's all that was left. A finger. Nothing else.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Yes. Sirius Black may not have put his hands to the Potters, but he's the reason they're dead.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: And now he wants to finish what he started.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Mhmm.

name: Rosmerta
line: I don't believe it.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Ah, that's not the worst of it.

name: Rosmerta
line: What could be worse?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: This: Sirius Black was... and remains to this day... Harry Potter's godfather!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron, look! Sorry, sorry. Excuse me, excuse me, sorry. Harry, what happened?

name: Harry Potter
line: He was their friend... and he betrayed them. He was their friend! I hope he finds me. Because when he does, I'm gonna be ready! When he does, I'm gonna kill him!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Harry. There you are. You came. Are you sure about this, Harry? You know this is very advanced magic well beyond the Ordinary Wizarding Level.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm sure.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Well, everything's prepared. Now, the spell I'm going to try to teach you is called the Patronus Charm. Did you ever hear of it? No? Well... A Patronus is a kind of positive force. For the wizard who conjures one... it works something like a shield, with the dementor feeding on it rather than him. But in order for it to work, you need to think of a memory. Not just any memory, a very happy memory, a very powerful memory.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Can you do this? Yes. Very well. Close your eyes. Concentrate. Explore your past. Do you have a memory? Allow it to fill you up. Lose yourself within it. Then speak the incantation, Expecto Patronum.

name: Harry Potter
line: Expecto Patronum.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Very good. Shall we? Wand at the ready.

name: Harry Potter
line: Expecto Patronum! Expecto... Expecto... Expect...

name: Remus Lupin
line: Here we go. Come on. Sit up. Deep breaths. It's all right. I didn't expect you to do it the first time. That would have been remarkable. Here, eat this. You'll feel better.

name: Harry Potter
line: That's one nasty dementor.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Oh, no, no, no. That was a boggart, Harry. A boggart. The real thing would be worse. Much, much worse. As a matter of interest, what were you thinking? Which memory did you choose?

name: Harry Potter
line: The first time I rode a broom.

name: Remus Lupin
line: That's not good enough. Not nearly good enough.

name: Harry Potter
line: There's another. It's not... happy, exactly. Well, it is. It's the happiest I've ever felt... but it's complicated.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Is it strong? Then let's give it a try. You feel ready?

name: Harry Potter
line: Just do it. Expecto Patronum! Expecto Patronum!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Yes! Well done, Harry. Well done!

name: Harry Potter
line: I think I've had enough for today.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Yes. Sit down. Here. Eat this, it helps. It really helps. And just so you know, Harry... I think you'd have given your father a run for his money. And that... is saying something.

name: Harry Potter
line: I was thinking of him. And Mom. Seeing their faces. They were talking to me. Just talking. That's the memory I chose. I don't even know if it's real. But it's the best I have.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Beautiful day.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Gorgeous.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Unless of course you've been ripped to pieces!

name: Harry Potter
line: Ripped to pieces? What are you talking about?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ronald has lost his rat.

name: Ron Weasley
line: I haven't lost anything! Your cat killed him!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Rubbish.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry, you've seen the way that bloodthirsty beast of hers... is always lurking about. And Scabbers is gone.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Well, maybe you should take better care of your pets!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Your cat killed him!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Did not.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Did.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Didn't.

name: Hermione Granger
line: How did it go, Hagrid? The hearing?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Well, first off, the committee members took turns... talking about why we were there. And then I got up and did my piece. Said how Buckbeak... was a good hippogriff, always cleaned his feathers. And then Lucius Malfoy got up. Well, you can imagine. He said Buckbeak was a deadly and dangerous creature... who would kill you as soon as look at you.

name: Hermione Granger
line: And then?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: And then he asked for the worst, did old Lucius.

name: Harry Potter
line: They're not sacking you!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No, I'm not sacked. Buckbeak's been sentenced to death!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Spiders! There's... There's spiders. Spiders. They want me to tap-dance. I don't wanna tap-dance!

name: Harry Potter
line: You tell those spiders Ron.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Right, yeah. Tell them. I'll tell them...

name: Rosmerta
line: Peter Pettigrew?

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Little lump of a boy. Always trailing after Sirius Black.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Black was vicious. He didn't kill Pettigrew, he destroyed him!

name: Ghost
line: Put that light out!

name: Harry Potter
line: Sorry.

name: Ghost
line: Watch it there, boy.

name: Ghost
line: We're trying to sleep here!

name: Ghost
line: Yes, we are.

name: Harry Potter
line: Mischief managed. Nox.

name: Severus Snape
line: Potter. What are you doing wandering the corridors at night?

name: Harry Potter
line: I was sleepwalking.

name: Severus Snape
line: How extraordinarily like your father you are, Potter. He, too, was exceedingly arrogant, strutting about the castle.

name: Harry Potter
line: My dad didn't strut. And nor do I. Now, if you don't mind, I would appreciate it if you could lower your wand.

name: Severus Snape
line: Turn out your pockets. Turn out your pockets! What's this?

name: Harry Potter
line: Spare bit of parchment.

name: Severus Snape
line: Really? Open it. Reveal your secrets. Read it.

name: Harry Potter
line: Mr's. Moony, Wormtail, Padfoot, and Prongs... offer their compliments to Professor Snape and...

name: Severus Snape
line: Go on.

name: Harry Potter
line: And request that he keep his abnormally large nose out of other people's business.

name: Severus Snape
line: Why, you insolent little...

name: Remus Lupin
line: Professor!

name: Severus Snape
line: Well, well. Lupin. Out for a little walk... in the moonlight, are we?

name: Remus Lupin
line: Harry, are you alright?

name: Severus Snape
line: That remains to be seen. I have just now confiscated a rather curious artifact from Mr. Potter. Take a look, Lupin. Supposed to be your area of expertise. Clearly, it's full of dark magic.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Oh, I seriously doubt it, Severus. It looks as though it's merely a parchment designed to insult anyone... who tries to read it. I suspect it's a Zonko product. Nevertheless, I shall investigate any hidden qualities it may possess. It is, after all, as you say, my area of expertise. Harry, would you come with me, please? Professor, good night.

name: Ghost
line: Are you deaf? Put that light out!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Come in. I haven't the faintest idea how this map came to be in your possession... but quite frankly, I am astounded that you didn't hand it in. Did it never occur to you that this, in the hands of Sirius Black... is a map to you?

name: Harry Potter
line: No. No, sir.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Your father never set much store by the rules either. But he and your mother gave their lives to save yours. Gambling their sacrifice by wandering around the castle unprotected... with a killer on the loose seems to me a poor way to repay them! Now, I will not cover up for you again, Harry. Do you hear me?

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, sir.

name: Remus Lupin
line: I want you to return to your dormitory and stay there. And don't take any detours. If you do, I shall know.

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor, just so you know, I don't think that map always works. Earlier, it showed someone in the castle. Someone I know to be dead.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Oh, really? And who might that be?

name: Harry Potter
line: Peter Pettigrew.

name: Remus Lupin
line: That's not possible.

name: Harry Potter
line: It's just what I saw. Good night, professor.

name: Sybill Trelawney
line: Broaden your minds. You must look beyond. The art of crystal gazing is in the clearing of the Inner Eye. Only then can you see. Try again. Now, what do we have here?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Oh, do you mind me trying? The Grim, possibly.

name: Sybill Trelawney
line: My dear, from the first moment you stepped foot in my class... I sensed that you did not possess the proper spirit... for the noble art of Divination. No, you see, there. You may be young in years, but the heart that beats beneath your bosom is as shriveled as an old maid's, your soul as dry as the pages of the books... to which you so desperately cleave. Have I said something?

name: Ron Weasley
line: She's gone mental, Hermione has. I mean, not that she wasn't always mental... but now it's in the open for everyone to see.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hang on. We better take this back.

name: Ron Weasley
line: I'm not going back.

name: Harry Potter
line: Fine. See you later.

name: Ron Weasley
line: See you.

name: Sirius Black
line: Harry Potter...

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor Trelawney...

name: Sybill Trelawney
line: He will return tonight.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sorry?

name: Sybill Trelawney
line: Tonight, he who betrayed his friends, whose heart rots with murder... shall break free. Innocent blood shall be spilt... and servant and master shall be reunited once more. I'm so sorry, dear boy. Did you say something?

name: Harry Potter
line: No. Nothing.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I can't believe they're going to kill Buckbeak. It's just too horrible.

name: Ron Weasley
line: It just got worse.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Now I'll tell you. Father said... I can keep the hippogriff's head. I think I'll donate it to the Gryffindors' room. This is going to be rich. Look who's here. Come to see the show?

name: Hermione Granger
line: You! You foul, loathsome, evil little cockroach!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hermione, no! He's not worth it.

name: Vincent Crabbe
line: Malfoy, are you okay? Let's go. Quick.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Not a word to anyone, understood?

name: Hermione Granger
line: That felt good.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Not good, brilliant!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Look at him. Loves the smell of the trees when the wind blows through them.

name: Harry Potter
line: Why don't we just set him free?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: They'd know it was me, and then Dumbledore... would get into trouble. He's coming down, you know? Dumbledore. Says he wants to be with me when they... When it happens. Great man, Dumbledore. A great man.

name: Hermione Granger
line: We'll stay with you too, Hagrid.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: You'll do no such thing! Think I want you seeing something like that? No. You just drink your tea and be off. Oh. Before you do, Ron...

name: Ron Weasley
line: Scabbers! You're alive!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Keep a closer eye on your pets, Ron.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I think that means you owe someone an apology.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Right. Next time I see Crookshanks, I'll let him know.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I meant me!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Blimey! What was that?

name: Harry Potter
line: Ow! Hagrid!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Oh, crikey.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Very interesting.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: No, minister. Over this way.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: It's late. It's nearly dark. You shouldn't be here. Someone sees you outside the castle at this time of night, you'll be in trouble. Big trouble. Particularly you, Harry. With you in a moment! Quick. Quick!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid. It'll be fine. It'll be okay.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Go on, go on!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Yes, that's the... lings you see over there...

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: On the slope.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: On the slope... Ah, Hagrid.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Professor Dumbledore.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Good evening.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Minister. Just make your way through. Have a tea, if you like.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: No, Hagrid, thank you. Now gentlemen...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I'd like to have a cup of tea.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Well, I think we should get down to our business, shall we? Very well. It is the decision of the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures that the hippogriff known as Buckbeak, hereinafter called the condemned, shall be executed this day at sundown.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Dear, dear...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Now, now, Hagrid. Now, come on. All right. It'll be all right.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: The execution shall dispatch...

name: Harry Potter
line: What?

name: Hermione Granger
line: I thought I just saw... Never mind.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Let's go!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Buckbeak didn't mean no harm.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Oh, no.

name: Ron Weasley
line: He bit me! Scabbers!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron. Ron! Ron!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Scabbers, come back!

name: Harry Potter
line: Wait!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Scabbers, you bit me!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry, you do realize what tree this is?

name: Harry Potter
line: That's not good. Ron, run!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry, Hermione, run! It's the Grim! Harry!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron! Ron, wait! Harry!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Help!

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron! Ron! Ron! Ron! Come on! Move!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Duck!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Oh, I'm sorry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Don't worry.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Where do you suppose this goes?

name: Harry Potter
line: I have a hunch. I just hope I'm wrong.

name: Hermione Granger
line: We're in the Shrieking Shack, aren't we?

name: Harry Potter
line: Come on. Ron.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron. You're okay. The dog. Where is it?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry it's a trap. He's the dog. He's an Animagus.

name: Hermione Granger
line: If you want to kill Harry, you'll have to kill us too!

name: Sirius Black
line: No. Only one will die tonight.

name: Harry Potter
line: Then it'll be you!

name: Sirius Black
line: Are you going to kill me, Harry?

name: Remus Lupin
line: Expelliarmus! Well, well, Sirius. Looking rather ragged, aren't we? Finally, the flesh reflects the madness within.

name: Sirius Black
line: Well, you'd know all about the madness within, wouldn't you Remus? I found him.

name: Remus Lupin
line: I know.

name: Sirius Black
line: It's him.

name: Remus Lupin
line: I understand.

name: Sirius Black
line: Let's kill him!

name: Hermione Granger
line: No! I trusted you! And all this time, you've been his friend. He's a werewolf! That's why he's been missing classes.

name: Remus Lupin
line: How long have you known?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Since Professor Snape set the essay.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Well, well, well, Hermione. You really are the brightest witch of your age, I've ever met.

name: Sirius Black
line: Enough talk, Remus! Come on, let's kill him!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Wait!

name: Sirius Black
line: I did my waiting! Twelve years of it! In Azkaban!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Very well. Kill him. But wait one more minute. Harry has the right to know why.

name: Harry Potter
line: I know why. You betrayed my parents. You're the reason they're dead!

name: Remus Lupin
line: No, Harry it wasn't him. Somebody did betray your parents... but it was somebody who, until quite recently, I believed to be dead!

name: Harry Potter
line: Who was it, then?

name: Sirius Black
line: Peter Pettigrew! And he's in this room! Right now! Come out, come out, Peter! Come out, come out and play!

name: Severus Snape
line: Expelliarmus! Vengeance is sweet. How I hoped I'd be the one to catch you.

name: Sirius Black
line: Severus...

name: Severus Snape
line: I told Dumbledore you were helping an old friend into the castle, and now here's the proof.

name: Sirius Black
line: Brilliant, Snape. Once again you've put your keen penetrating mind to the task and as usual come to the wrong conclusion. Now, if you'll excuse us, Remus and I have some unfinished business... to attend to.

name: Severus Snape
line: Give me a reason. I beg you!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Severus don't be a fool.

name: Sirius Black
line: He can't help it. It's habit.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Sirius be quiet.

name: Sirius Black
line: Be quiet yourself Remus!

name: Severus Snape
line: Oh listen to you two, quarreling like an old married couple.

name: Sirius Black
line: Why don't you run along and play with your chemistry set!

name: Severus Snape
line: I could do it, you know. But why deny the dementors? They're so longing to see you. Do I detect a flicker of fear? Oh, yes. A Dementor's Kiss. One can only imagine what that must be like. It's said to be nearly unbearable to witness, but I'll do my best.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Severus, please.

name: Severus Snape
line: After you.

name: Harry Potter
line: Expelliarmus!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Harry! What did you just do?

name: Hermione Granger
line: You attacked a teacher!

name: Harry Potter
line: Tell me about Peter.

name: Remus Lupin
line: He was at school with us. We thought he was our friend!

name: Harry Potter
line: No. Pettigrew's dead. You killed him!

name: Remus Lupin
line: No, he didn't. I thought so too, until you mentioned seeing Pettigrew on the map!

name: Harry Potter
line: The map was lying, then.

name: Sirius Black
line: The map never lies! Pettigrew's alive! And he's right there!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Me?! He's mental!

name: Sirius Black
line: Not you! Your rat!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Scabbers has been in my family for...

name: Sirius Black
line: Twelve years? Curiously long life for a common garden rat! He's missing a toe, isn't he?

name: Ron Weasley
line: So what?

name: Harry Potter
line: All they could find of Pettigrew was his...

name: Sirius Black
line: Finger! That dirty coward cut it off so everyone would think he was dead! And then he transformed into a rat!

name: Harry Potter
line: Show me. Give it to him, Ron.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What are you trying to do to him? Scabbers! Leave him alone! Get off him! What are you doing?

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Remus? Sirius. My old friends! Harry! Look at you! You look so much like your father! Like James! We were the best of friends...

name: Sirius Black
line: How dare you speak to Harry! How dare you talk about James in front of him!

name: Remus Lupin
line: You sold James and Lily to Voldemort, didn't you?

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: I didn't mean to! The Dark Lord. You have no idea the weapons he possesses! Ask yourself, Sirius! What would you have done? What would you have done?

name: Sirius Black
line: I would have died! I would have died, rather than betray my friends!

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Harry, James wouldn't have wanted me killed! Your dad... Your dad would have spared me! He would show me mercy!

name: Remus Lupin
line: You should've realized, Peter, that if Voldemort didn't kill you, then we would! Together!

name: Harry Potter
line: No!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Harry, this man...

name: Harry Potter
line: I know what he is. But we'll take him to the castle.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Bless you, boy! Bless you!

name: Harry Potter
line: Get off! I said we'd take you to the castle. After that, the dementors can have you.

name: Sirius Black
line: Sorry about the bite. I reckon that twinges a bit.

name: Ron Weasley
line: A bit? A bit? You almost tore my leg off!

name: Sirius Black
line: I was going for the rat. Normally, I have a very sweet disposition as a dog. In fact, more than once, James suggested that I make the change permanent. The tail I could live with. But the fleas, they're murder.

name: Harry Potter
line: Okay.

name: Ron Weasley
line: You better go.

name: Harry Potter
line: No. Don't worry, okay? It's fine. I'll stay.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You go, I'll stay.

name: Harry Potter
line: You okay?

name: Ron Weasley
line: I'm fine. Go.

name: Hermione Granger
line: That looks really painful.

name: Ron Weasley
line: So painful. They might chop it.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I'm sure Madam Pomfrey will fix it in a heartbeat.

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's too late. It's ruined. It'll have to be chopped off.

name: Sirius Black
line: It's beautiful, isn't it? I'll never forget the first time I walked through those doors. It'll be nice to do it again as a free man. That was a noble thing you did back there. He doesn't deserve it.

name: Harry Potter
line: Well I just didn't think my dad would have wanted his two best friends... to become killers. Besides, dead, the truth dies with him. Alive, you're free.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Turn me into a maggot! Turn me into a flobberworm! Anything but the dementors! Ron! Haven't I been a good friend? A good pet? You won't let them give me to the dementors, will you? I was your rat! Sweet girl! Clever girl! Surely you won't let them...

name: Remus Lupin
line: Get away from her!

name: Sirius Black
line: I don't know if you know, Harry... but when you were born, James and Lily made me your godfather.

name: Harry Potter
line: I know.

name: Sirius Black
line: I can understand if you choose to stay with your aunt and uncle... but if you ever wanted a different home...

name: Harry Potter
line: What? Come and live with you?

name: Sirius Black
line: It's just a thought. I can understand if you don't want to.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry!

name: Sirius Black
line: Remus, my old friend! Have you taken your potion tonight? You know the man you truly are, Remus! This heart is where you truly live! This heart here! This flesh is only flesh!

name: Harry Potter
line: Expelliarmus!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry!

name: Sirius Black
line: Remus! Remus! Run! Run!

name: Harry Potter
line: Come on.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Wait! Wait!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hermione! Bad idea. Bad idea.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Professor? Professor Lupin?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Nice doggy. Nice doggy!

name: Severus Snape
line: There you are, Potter!

name: Harry Potter
line: Sirius!

name: Severus Snape
line: Come back here, Potter!

name: Harry Potter
line: Sirius! No. Sirius! Expecto Patronum!
