line: The enemy?? Who was it wanting his autograph? Besides, the whole point of the tournament is international magical cooperation, to make friends.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hrmph, I think he's got a bit more than friendship on his mind.

name: Padma Patil
line: Are you going to ask me to dance or not?

name: Ron Weasley
line: No.

name: Ron Weasley
line: He's using you.

name: Hermione Granger
line: How dare you! Besides I can take care of myself.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Doubt it. He's way too old.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What? What? That's what you think?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Yeah that is what I think.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You know the solution then don't you.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Go on.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Next time there's a ball pluck up the courage and ask me before somebody else does, and not as a last resort.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Well that's completely off the point. Harry...

name: Hermione Granger
line: Where have you been? Nevermind! Off to bed both of you.

name: Ron Weasley
line: They get scary when they get older.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron you spoil everything!

name: Voldermort
line: Let me see it again.

name: Voldemort
line: Ah yes, the time is close now. Harry! At last! Step aside Wormtail so I can give our guest a proper greeting!

name: Neville Longbottom
line: You alright Harry? I just got in. Me!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry you told me you'd figured the egg out weeks ago. The task is two days from now.

name: Harry Potter
line: Really? I had no idea. I suppose Viktor's already figured it out.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I wouldn't know, we didn't actually talk about the tournament. Actually we didn't really talk at all, Viktor's more of a physical being. I just mean he's not particularly... Mostly he watches me study. It's a bit annoying actually. You are trying to figure this egg out aren't you?

name: Harry Potter
line: What's that supposed to mean?

name: Hermione Granger
line: I mean these tasks are supposed to test you, in the most brutal way they're almost cruel. And um, I'm scared for you. You got by the dragon mostly on nerve, I'm not sure it's going to be enough this time.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Hey Potter.

name: Harry Potter
line: Cedric.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: How are you?

name: Harry Potter
line: Spectacular.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Look I realise I never really thanked you properly for tipping me off about those dragons.

name: Harry Potter
line: Forget about it. I'm sure you would have done the same for me.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Exactly. You know the prefects bathroom on the fifth floor?

name: Cedric Diggory
line: It's not a bad place for a bath. Just take your egg and mull things over in the hot water.

name: Harry Potter
line: I must be out of my mind.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: I'd try putting it in the water if I were you.

name: Harry Potter
line: Myrtle!

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Long time no see.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: I was circling a blocked drain the other day and could swear I saw a bit of polyjuice potion. Not being a bad boy again are you Harry?

name: Harry Potter
line: Polyjuice potion! Kicked the habit. Myrtle, did you say try putting it in the water?

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Well. That's what he did. The other boy, the handsome one. Cedric.

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Well go on, open it.

name: Merpeople
line: Come seek us where our voices sound. We cannot sing above the ground. An hour long you'll have to look, to recover what we took.

name: Harry Potter
line: Myrtle, there aren't Merpeople in the black lake are there?

name: Moaning Myrtle
line: Ahhh, very good. Took Cedric ages to riddle it out. Almost all the bubbles were gone...

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry, tell me again.

name: Harry Potter
line: Come seek us where our voices sound.

name: Hermione Granger
line: The black lake, that's obvious.

name: Harry Potter
line: An hour long you'll have to look.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Again obvious, though I must admit potentially problematic

name: Harry Potter
line: Potentially problematic? When was the last time you held your breath under the water for an hour Hermione?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Look Harry, we can do this. The three of us can figure it out.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Hate to break up this scholar session but Professor McGonagall would like to see you in her office. Not you Potter, just Weasly and Granger.

name: Hermione Granger
line: But sir, the second task is only hours away and...

name: Alastor Moody
line: Exactly. Presumably Potter is well prepared by now and could do with a good night's sleep. Go. Now! Longbottom!

name: Alastor Moody
line: Why don't you help Potter put his books back.

name: Neville Longbottom
line: You know, if you're interested in plants you'd be better with Gorshok's Guide to Herbology. Do you know there's a wizard in Nepal whose growing gravity resistant trees?

name: Harry Potter
line: Neville. No offense, but I really don't care about plants. Now if there's a Tibetan turnip that will allow me to breathe underwater for an hour then great.

name: Neville Longbottom
line: I don't know about a turnip but you can always use gilliweed.

name: Harry Potter
line: You're sure about this Neville.

name: Neville Longbottom
line: Absolutely.

name: Harry Potter
line: For an hour.

name: Neville Longbottom
line: Most likely.

name: Harry Potter
line: Most likely?

name: Neville Longbottom
line: Well there is some debate among herbologists as to the effects of freshwater versus saltwater.

name: Harry Potter
line: You're telling me this now? You must be joking.

name: Neville Longbottom
line: I just wanted to help.

name: Harry Potter
line: Well that makes you sight better than Ron and Hermione. Where are they anyway?

name: Neville Longbottom
line: You seem a little tense Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Do I?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Welcome to the second task. Last night something was stolen from each of our champions. A treasure of sorts. These four treasures, one for each champion, now lie on the bottom of the black lake. In order to win each champion need only find their treasure and return to the surface. Simple enough. Except for this, they will have one hour to do so and one hour only. After that they'll be on their own.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Put that in your mouth.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: You may begin at the start of the cannon.

name: Seamus Finnigan
line: What's the matter with him?

name: Dean Thomas
line: I don't know I can't see him.

name: Neville Longbottom
line: Oh my god I've killed Harry Potter!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: The Beauxbatons champion Miss Delacour has unfortunately been forced to retire. She will take no further part in this task.

name: Harry Potter
line: But she's my friend too!

name: Merpeople
line: Only one.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Harry!

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Get him another towel.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I want all the judges over here now.

name: Fleur Delacour
line: You saved her, even though she wasn't yours to save. My little sister!

name: Fleur Delacour
line: Thank you! And you... . You helped!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Well... yeah... a bit

name: Ron Weasley
line: Merci.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione

name: Hermione Granger
line: Are you alright? You must be freezing! Personally I think you behaved admirably.

name: Harry Potter
line: I finished last Hermione.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Next to last.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Attention! Attention! The winner is... Mr Diggory!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: For showing unique command of the bubblehead shark. The way I see it, Mr Potter would have finished first had it not been for his determination to rescue not only Mr Weasly but the others as well. We've agreed to award him second place! For outstanding moral fibre.

name: Fred Weasley
line: All that moral fibre eh?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Blimey even when you go wrong it turns out right.

name: George Weasley
line: Well done 'moral fibre'.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Congratulations Potter, fine achievement. Well done boy. I'm sorry we haven't spoken, after all your story is one I've heard many times. Quite remarkable. Tragic of course, to lose one's family. Never whole again are we? Still, life goes on. And here we stand. I'm sure your parents would be very proud today Potter.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Bartimus! Not trying to lure Potter into one of the ministry's summer internships are we? Last boy who went into the department of ministries never came out!

name: Alastor Moody
line: And they say I'm mad.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: So I remember, I remember when I first met you all. Biggest bunch of misfits I've ever set eyes on. Always reminded me of myself a little. And here we all are, four years later.

name: Ron Weasley
line: We're still misfits.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Maybe. But we've all got each other, and Harry of course. Soon to be! The youngest! Tri-Wizard champion there's ever been! Hooray!

name: Harry Potter
line: Mr Crouch?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: A man has died here. And he won't be the last, you must take action.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: I will not. In times like these the wizard world looks to its leaders for strength Dumbledore.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Then for once show them some.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: The tri-wizard tournament will not be cancelled. I will not be seen as a coward.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: But surely that is what's right, no matter what others think.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: What did you say? What did you say to me?

name: Alastor Moody
line: Excuse me gentlemen, it may interest you to know that this conversation is no longer private.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Harry! Harry how good to see you again.

name: Harry Potter
line: I can come back later Professor.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Oh not necessary Harry the minister and I are done. I'll be back in a moment. Minister, after you. Harry do feel free to indulge in a liquorice snack in my absence, but I have to warn you they're a little bit sharp.

name: Harry Potter
line: Agh!

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor?

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Igor Karkaroff, you have been brought from Azkaban at your own request to present evidence to this counsel. Should your testimony prove consequential. Counsel may be prepared to order your immediate release. Until such time you remain in the eyes of the ministry a convicted deatheater. Do you accept these terms?

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: I do sir.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: What do you wish to present?

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: I have names sir. There was a Rosier, Evan Rosier.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Mr Rosier is dead.

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: Dead?

name: Alastor Moody
line: Yeah took a piece of me with him though didn't he.

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: I didn't know.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: If that is all the witness has to offer...

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: No! No! There was Rookwood, he was a spy.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Augustus Rookwood? Of the department of ministries.

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: Ya ya, the same. He passed information to you know who from inside the ministry itself.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Very well. Counsel will deliberate. In the meantime you will be returned to Azkaban.

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: NO! WAIT! PLEASE! I have more. Snape, Severus Snape.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: The counsel is very much aware you have given evidence on this matter. Severus Snape was indeed a deatheater and prior to Lord Voldemort's downfall turned spy for us at great personal risk. Today he's no more a deatheater than I am.

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: It's a lie! Severus Snape remains faithful to the dark lord.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Silence!

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Unless the witness possesses any name of genuine consequence this session is now concluded.

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: Oh no no no no no. I heard about one more.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: What's that?

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: The name...

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: Yes?

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: I know for a fact this person took part in the capture, and by means of the cruciatus curse, torture of the aurer Frank Longbottom and...

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: The name! Give me the wretched name!

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: Barty Crouch! ... Junior.

name: Bartemius Crouch Junior
line: Get your hands off me you pathetic little men. Hello father.

name: Bartemius Crouch
line: You are no son of mine.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Curiosity's not a sin Harry, but you should exercise caution. It's a pensieve, useful if like me you find your mind a wee bit stretched. It allows me to see what small things I've already seen. You see Harry I've searched and searched for something, some small detail. Something I might have overlooked, something that would explain why these terrible things have happened. Every time I get close to an answer it slips away, it's maddedning.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir, Mr Crouch's son, what happened to him?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: He was sent to Azkaban. Destroyed Barty to do it. But he had no choice, the evidence was overwhelming. Why do you ask?

name: Harry Potter
line: It's just that I had a dream about him. It was in the summer, before school. In the dream I was in a house and Voldemort was there only he wasn't quite human, and Wormtail was there too and Mr Crouch's son.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Have there been other dreams like this?

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes. Always the same one. Sir... these dreams, what I see, you don't think it's actually happening do you?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I think it's unwise for you to linger over these dreams Harry, I think it's best that you simply...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Cast them away.

name: Igor Karkaroff
line: It's a sign Severus, you know what it means as well as I.

name: Severus Snape
line: Potter! What's your hurry? Congratulations, your performance in the black lake was inspiring. Gilliweed, am I correct?

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes sir.

name: Severus Snape
line: Ingenious. A rather rare herb gilliweed, not something found in your every day garden. Nor is this, know what it is?

name: Harry Potter
line: Bubble juice sir?

name: Severus Snape
line: Veritaserum. Three drops of this and you-know-who himself will spill his darkest secrets. The use of this on a student is regrettably forbidden, however should you ever steal from my personal stores again, my hand might just slip over your morning pumpkin juice.

name: Harry Potter
line: I haven't stolen anything.

name: Severus Snape
line: Don't lie to me. Gilliweed might be innocuous, but boomslang skin? lacewing flies? You and your friends are brewing polyjuice potion and believe me I'm going to find out why.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Earlier today Professor Moody placed the tri-wizards cup deep within the maze. Only he knows its exact position. Now as Mr Diggory...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: and Mr Potter tied for first position they will be the first to enter the maze. Followed by Mr Krum...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: The first person to touch the cup will be the winner. I've instructed the staff to patrol the perimeter, if at any point should a contestant wish to withdraw from the task he or she need only send up red sparks with their wands. Contestants, gather round.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: In the maze you'll find not dragons or creatures of the deep. Instead you'll face something more challenging. You see, people change in the maze. Oh find the cup if you can, but be very weary you could just lose yourselves along the way.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Champions! Prepare yourselves.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: On the count of three... ONE...

name: Harry Potter
line: Fleur? Fleur!

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Get down!

name: Harry Potter
line: No stop! He's bewitched Cedric.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Get off me!

name: Harry Potter
line: He's bewitched!

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Harry! Harry!

name: Cedric Diggory
line: You know for a moment there I thought you were gonna let it get me.

name: Harry Potter
line: For a moment so did I.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Some game huh?

name: Harry Potter
line: Some game.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Go. Take it, you saved me!

name: Harry Potter
line: Together, on three. One, two, three!

name: Cedric Diggory
line: You ok?

name: Harry Potter
line: Yeah, you?

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Where are we?

name: Harry Potter
line: I've been here before.

name: Cedric Diggory
line: It's a portkey. Harry the cup is a portkey.

name: Harry Potter
line: I've been here before in a dream. Cedric, we have to get back to the cup? Now!

name: Cedric Diggory
line: What are you talking about?

name: Cedric Diggory
line: What is it?

name: Harry Potter
line: Get back to the cup!

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Who are you? What do you want?

name: Voldemort
line: Kill the spare.

name: Harry Potter
line: Cedric!

name: Voldemort
line: Do it, now!

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Bones of the father, unwillingly given.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Flesh of the servent willingly sacrificed.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Blood of the enemy forcibly taken.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: The dark lord shall rise again.

name: Voldemort
line: My wand Wormtail.

name: Voldemort
line: Hold out your arm.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Master. Thank you master.

name: Voldemort
line: The other arm Wormtail.

name: Voldemort
line: Welcome my friends. Thirty years it's been, and yet you stand before me as though it were only yesterday. I confess myself disappointed, not one of you tried to find me.

name: Voldemort
line: Not even you, Lucius.

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: My lord. Had I detected any sign or even a whisper of your whereabouts.

name: Voldemort
line: There were signs my friend, and more than whispers.

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: I assure you I never renounced the old ways. The face I have been obliged to present each day since your absence, that was my true mask.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: I returned.

name: Voldemort
line: Out of fear, not loyalty. Still you have proved yourself useful these past few months Wormtail.

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Thank you master, thank you.

name: Voldemort
line: Oh, such a handsome boy.

name: Harry Potter
line: Don't touch him.

name: Voldemort
line: Harry! I'd almost forgotten you were here. Standing on the bones of my father. I'd introduce you but word has it you're almost as famous as me these days. The boy who lived. How lies have fed your legend Harry. Shall I reveal what really happened that night thirteen years ago? Shall I divulge how I truly lost my powers? It was love. You see when dear sweet Lily Potter gave her life for her only son she provided the ultimate protection. I could not touch you. It was old magic, something I should have forseen. But no matter, no matter. Things have changed, I can touch you now!

name: Voldemort
line: Astonishing what a few drops of your blood will do eh Harry? Pick up your wand Potter. I said pick it up, get up. Get up! You've been taught how to duel I presume yes? First we bow to each other. Come on now Harry the niceties must be observed, Dumbledore would not want you to forget your manners now would he? I said bow!

name: Voldemort
line: That's better. And now...

name: Voldemort
line: Atta boy Harry, your parents would be proud. Especially your filthy mongrel mother. I'm going to kill you Harry Potter, I'm going to destroy you. After tonight no one will ever again question my powers. After tonight if they speak of you they'll speak only of how you begged for death, and I being a merciful lord obliged. Get up.

name: Voldemort
line: Don't you turn your back on me Harry Potter I want you to look at me when I kill you, I want to see the lights leave your eyes.

name: Harry Potter
line: Have it your way.

name: Voldemort
line: Do nothing. He is mine to finish. He's mine!

name: James Potter
line: Harry when the connection is broken you must get to the portkey. We can delay it for a moment to give you time but only a moment, do you understand?

name: Cedric Diggory
line: Harry take my body back will you? Take my body back to my father.

name: Lily Potter
line: Let go. Sweetheart you're ready. Let go! Let go!

name: Voldemort
line: No!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Harry! Harry!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Tell me what happened!

name: Harry Potter
line: He's back, he's back! Voldemort's back. Cedric, he asked me to bring his body back. I couldn't leave him, not there.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: It's alright Harry. It's alright, he's home, you both are.

name: Cornelius Fudge
line: Keep everybody in their seats. A boy has just been killed. The body must be moved Dumbledore, there are... too many people.

name: Amos Diggory
line: Let me through! That's my son! My boy!

name: Alastor Moody
line: Are you alright Potter?

name: Alastor Moody
line: Does it hurt?

name: Harry Potter
line: Not so much now.

name: Alastor Moody
line: I'd better take a look at it.

name: Harry Potter
line: The cup was a portkey. Someone had bewitched it.

name: Alastor Moody
line: What was it like? What was he like?

name: Harry Potter
line: Who?

name: Alastor Moody
line: The dark lord. What was it like to stand in his presence?

name: Harry Potter
line: I dunno. It was like I'd fallen into one of my dreams. One of my nightmares.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Were there others? In the graveyard, were there others?

name: Harry Potter
line: Um. I don't think I said anything about a graveyard Professor.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Marvellous creatures dragons aren't they? Do you think that miserable oaf would have led you into the woods if I hadn't suggested it? Do you think Cedric Diggory would have told you to hold the egg under the water if I hadn't have told him first myself? Do you think Neville Longbottom the witless wonder could have provided you with gilliweed if I hadn't have given him the book that led you straight to it? Huh??

name: Harry Potter
line: It was you from the beginning. You put my name in the goblet of fire. You bewitched Krum. But...

name: Alastor Moody
line: You won because I made it so Potter. You ended up in that graveyard tonight because it was meant to be so. And now the deed is done. The blood that runs through these veins runs within the dark lord. Imagine how he will reward me when he learns that I have once and for all silenced the great Harry Potter.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Severus...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Do you know who I am?

name: Alastor Moody
line: Albus Dumbledore.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Are you Alastor Moody? Are ya?

name: Alastor Moody
line: No.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Is he in this room? Is he in this room?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Harry get away from there!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Are you alright Alastor?

name: Alastor Moody
line: I'm sorry Albus.

name: Harry Potter
line: That's Moody, but then who's...?

name: Severus Snape
line: Polyjuice potion.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Now we know who's been stealing it from your store Severus.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: We'll get you up in a minute.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Barty Crouch Junior.

name: Bartemius Crouch Junior
line: I'll show you mine if you show me yours.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Your arm Harry.

name: Bartemius Crouch Junior
line: You know what this means don't you? He's back. Lord Voldemort has returned.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Send an owl to Azkaban, think they'll find they're missing a prisoner.

name: Bartemius Crouch Junior
line: I'll be welcomed back like a hero.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Perhaps. Personally I've never had much time for heroes.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Today we acknowledge a really terrible loss. Cedric Diggory was as you all know, exceptionally hard working, intricately fair minded. And most importantly a fierce fierce friend. I think therefore you have the right to know exactly how he died. You see, Cedric Diggory was murdered by Lord Voldemort. The ministry of magic does not wish me to tell you this. But not to do so I think would be an insult to his memory. Now the pain we all feel at this dreadful loss reminds me, reminds us that while we may come from different places and speak in different tongues, our hearts beat as one. In light of recent events the bonds of friendship we made this year will be more important than ever. Remember that and Cedric Diggory will not have died in vain, you remember that. And we'll celebrate a boy who was kind and honest and brave and true right to the very end.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I never liked these curtains. Set them on fire in my fourth year, by accident of course. I put you in terrible danger this year Harry I'm sorry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor, when I was in the graveyard there was a moment... um... when Voldemort's wand and mine sort of connected.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Priori Incantatem. You saw your parents that night didn't you? They reappeared.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: No spell can reawaken the dead Harry I trust you know that. Dark and diffiult times lie ahead. Soon we must all face the choice between what is right what is easy. But remember this, you have friends here. You're not alone.

name: Viktor Krum
line: Write to me. Promise.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Bye.

name: Fleur Delacour
line: Au revoir Ron.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Do you think we'll ever just have a quiet year at Hogwarts?

name: Hermione Granger
line: No.

name: Harry Potter
line: No I don't think so.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Everything's going to change now isn't it?

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Promise you'll write this summer. Both of you.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Well I won't. You know I won't!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry will won't you?

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Oh, it's you.

name: Gang thug
line: What should we do with him, Big D?

name: Harry Potter
line: Big D? Cool name, but to me, you'll always be Ikkle Duddicums.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Shut up!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Ooo, tough guy. Not so tough in your bed, are you?

name: Harry Potter
line: What?

name: Arabella Figg
line: You boys go home now, or I'll be calling your parents!

name: Dudley Dursley
line: I heard you talking in your sleep, last night. Crying. "No, don't kill Cedric, don't kill Cedric! Dad, help me, heeelp me! He's going to kill me! Boo-hoo!"

name: Harry Potter
line: Shut up, Dudley. I'm warning you...

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Why should I?

name: Harry Potter
