line: Ol' Sluggy's having a Christmas do, you know.  And we're meant to bring someone...

name: Ron Weasley
line: I expect you'll be going with McLaggen.  Isn't he a member of the Slug Club?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Actually, I was going to ask you.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Really?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Really.  But seeing as you have such a distaste for the idea --

name: Lavender Brown
line: Good luck today, Ron!  I know you'll be brilliant!

name: Ron Weasley
line: I'm resigning.  After today's match.  McLaggen can have my spot.

name: Harry Potter
line: Have it your way.  Juice?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Sure...

name: Luna Lovegood
line: Hello, everyone.  You look dreadful, Ron.

name: Luna Lovegood
line: Is that why you just put something in his cup.  Is it a tonic?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Don't drink that, Ron!

name: Hermione Granger
line: You could be expelled for that.

name: Harry Potter
line: Dunno what you're talking about.

name: Ron Weasley
line: C'mon, Harry.  We've got a game to win.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: What's gotten into him?

name: Dean Thomas
line: Ginny!  Let's go!

name: Students
line: Weasley!  Weasley!  Weasley!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron seems to be enjoying himself.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yep.  Apparently it's his lucky day.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You shouldn't have done it, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yeah.  I suppose I could've just used, I dunno... a Confundus charm?

name: Hermione Granger
line: That was different.  It was tryouts.  This was an actual match --

name: Hermione Granger
line: You didn't put it in? Ron only thought you did?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Charms spell.  Just practicing.

name: Harry Potter
line: Ah.  Well... they're really good.

name: Hermione Granger
line: How does it feel, Harry?  When you see Dean with Ginny? I know, Harry.  You're my best friend.  I see how you look at her.

name: Lavender Brown
line: Oops.  I think this room's taken.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What's with the birds?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Oppugno!

name: Harry Potter
line: It feels like this.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Look, I can't help it if she's got her knickers in a twist.  What Lav and I have -- well, let's just say there was no stopping it.  It's chemical.  Will it last?  Who knows?  Point is, I'm a free agent.

name: Hermione Granger
line: He's at perfect liberty to kiss whomever he likes.  I really couldn't care less.  Was I under the impression that he and I would be attending Slughorn's Christmas party together?  Yes.  Of course, now, given the circumstances, I've had to make other arrangements.

name: Harry Potter
line: Have you?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Yes.  Why?

name: Harry Potter
line: I just thought, you know, since neither one of us can take who we'd really like... maybe we'd go together.  As friends.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Why didn't I think of that?

name: Harry Potter
line: So who are you taking?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Um... it's a surprise.  Besides, it's you we need to worry about. And you can't pick just anyone. See that girl over there.  That's Romilda Vane.  Rumor has it she's trying to slip you a love potion.

name: Harry Potter
line: Really...?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Hey! She's only interested in you because she thinks you're the Chosen One.  You know that, right?

name: Harry Potter
line: But I am the Chosen One.

name: Harry Potter
line: Okay.  Kidding.  I'll just ask someone I like.  Someone cool.

name: Luna Lovegood
line: I've never been to this part of the castle.  At least not while awake.  I sleepwalk, you see. It's why I wear shoes to bed.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Someone has taken a BITE out of it. Thank you, Adrian! One of mine.  Class of '78.  I had hoped for more out of him, but at least the pictures are in focus. Oh my!  Excuse me, Harry.  I must greet the new Minister of Magical Transportation.  Class of '67. Mingle, m'boy!  Mingle!  We're all friends here.  And we run the world.

name: Neville Longbottom
line: Drink?

name: Harry Potter
line: Neville...?

name: Neville Longbottom
line: I didn't make the cut for the Slug Club.  It's okay.  He's got Belby handing out towels in the loo.

name: Eldred Worple
line: Lovegood, did you say?  I once encountered a seriously unbalanced man by that name at a book signing.  Claimed to run a magazine...

name: Harry Potter
line: What're you doing?

name: Harry Potter
line: And what's happened to you?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Hm?  Oh, I've just escaped -- I mean, left Cormac.  Under the mistletoe.

name: Harry Potter
line: Cormac!  That's who you invited!

name: Hermione Granger
line: I thought it would annoy Ron most. But he's a menace.  He's got more tentacles than a Snarfalump plant.

name: Waiter
line: Dragon tartar?

name: Hermione Granger
line: No thank you.

name: Waiter
line: Just as well.  They give one horribly bad breath.

name: Hermione Granger
line: On second thought -- maybe it'll keep Cormac at bay.  Oh no, here he comes!

name: Harry Potter
line: I think she went to powder her nose.

name: Cormac McLaggen
line: Slippery little minx, your friend. Likes to work her mouth too, doesn't she?  Yak yak yak. What is this I'm eating, by the way?

name: Harry Potter
line: Dragon balls.

name: Severus Snape
line: What's going on back here?

name: Severus Snape
line: You've just bought yourself a month's detention, McLaggen.

name: Severus Snape
line: Not so quick, Potter.

name: Harry Potter
line: I think I should rejoin the party, sir.  My date...

name: Severus Snape
line: ... can surely survive your absence for another minute or two.

name: Severus Snape
line: Besides, I only wish to convey a message.

name: Harry Potter
line: A message...?

name: Severus Snape
line: From Professor Dumbledore.  He asked that I give you his best and that he hopes you enjoy your holiday.  You see, he's traveling and won't return until term resumes.

name: Harry Potter
line: Traveling?  Where?

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Take your hands off me,  you filthy squib!

name: Argus Filch
line: Professor Slughorn, sir!  I've just discovered this boy lurking in an upstairs corridor.  He claims to have been invited to your party.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Okay, okay, I was gate-crashing. Happy?

name: Severus Snape
line: I'll escort him out.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Certainly... Professor.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Maybe I did hex that Bell girl. Maybe I didn't.  What's it to you?

name: Severus Snape
line: I swore to protect you.  I made the Unbreakable Vow --

name: Draco Malfoy
line: I don't need protection.  I was chosen for this!  Out of all others.  Me!  And I won't fail him.

name: Severus Snape
line: You're afraid, Draco.  You attempt to conceal it, but it's obvious. Let me assist you --

name: Draco Malfoy
line: No!  I was chosen.  This is my moment!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Unbreakable Vow.  You're sure that's what Snape said.

name: Harry Potter
line: Positive.  Why?

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's just, well, you can't break an Unbreakable Vow.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'd worked that much out for myself, funnily enough.

name: Ron Weasley
line: No, you don't understand -- Oh, bloody hell...

name: Harry Potter
line: Lovely.

name: Ron Weasley
line: All she wants to do is snog me. My lips are getting chapped. Look.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'll take your word for it.

name: Harry Potter
line: So what happens?  If you break an Unbreakable Vow?

name: Ron Weasley
line: You die.

name: Molly Weasley
line: Eat up, eat up, everyone!  There's more to come!

name: Harry Potter
line: Draco's plotting something, I know it, something to do with Voldemort.  He's been given a task or a mission -- and Snape was offering to help.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Voldemort has chosen Draco Malfoy for a mission?

name: Harry Potter
line: I know it sounds mad --

name: Remus Lupin
line: Has it occurred to you, Harry, that Snape was simply pretending to offer Draco help so that he could find out what he's up to?

name: Harry Potter
line: That's not what it sounded like.

name: Nymphadora Tonks
line: Perhaps Harry's right, Remus.  To make an Unbreakable Vow, after all --

name: Remus Lupin
line: It comes down to whether or not you trust Dumbledore's judgement. He trusts Snape.  Therefore, I do.

name: Harry Potter
line: But Dumbledore can make mistakes. He's said it himself --

name: Remus Lupin
line: You're blinded by hatred.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm not --

name: Remus Lupin
line: You are!  People are disappearing, Harry.  Daily.  We can only put our trust in a handful of people. If we start fighting amongst ourselves, we're doomed.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Open up, you.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Don't trust me?

name: Harry Potter
line: It's good.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: 'Course 'tis.  Made them myself.

name: Arthur Weasley
line: You'll have to forgive Remus.  It takes its toll -- his condition.

name: Harry Potter
line: Are you alright, Mr. Weasley?

name: Arthur Weasley
line: We're being followed, all of us. Molly doesn't leave the house most days.  It's not been easy.

name: Harry Potter
line: Did you get my owl?

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Yes, but I thought it best if I replied in person.  If Dumbledore's traveling, it's news to the Ministry.  But perhaps that's the way Dumbledore wants it.  As for Draco Malfoy -- I know a bit more.

name: Harry Potter
line: Go on.

name: Arthur Weasley
line: I sent an agent to Borgin & Burkes.  From what you describe, I think what you and Ron saw at the end of the summer -- the object that Draco seemed so interested in -- was a Vanishing Cabinet.

name: Harry Potter
line: A Vanishing Cabinet?

name: Arthur Weasley
line: They were all the rage when Voldemort first rose to power. You can imagine the appeal. Should the Death Eaters come calling, one needed only slip inside and disappear for an hour or two.  But they're tricky contraptions.  Require a tremendous amount of looking after.  Eventually they fell out of favor.

name: Harry Potter
line: What happened to it?  The one at Borgin & Burkes?

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Nothing.  It's still there.

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Harry.  You know, I went through all this before -- the last time around.  Times like these -- dark times -- do funny things to people.  It can bring them together and it can tear them apart.  Things... speed up.  It's what happens when you don't know if today will be your last.

name: Nymphadora Tonks
line: It was delicious, Molly.  Really.

name: Molly Weasley
line: You're sure you won't stay?

name: Nymphadora Tonks
line: No, we should go. The first night of the cycle is always the worst --

name: Molly Weasley
line: Remus...?

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Everyone gone to bed?

name: Harry Potter
line: Soon.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: I don't sleep these days.  So I wash my hair.  Silly, right?

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Happy Christmas, Harry.

name: Nymphadora Tonks
line: Sweetheart...

name: Remus Lupin
line: There's someone out there.  I can smell him.  There's more than one --

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Oh my god...

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Harry, no!

name: Nymphadora Tonks
line: Remus!

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Ginny, stay with your mother!

name: Ginny Weasley
line: No, Harry!  It's a trap!

name: Fenrir Greyback
line: Don't you smell clean.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You have to realize who you are, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: I know who I am, Hermione, alright?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Sorry. So tell me what Arthur said.

name: Harry Potter
line: If Dumbledore's traveling places, it's news to the Ministry.  But get this:  that night at Borgin & Burkes?  It seems Draco was looking at a Vanishing Cabinet.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What would Draco want with a Vanishing Cabinet?

name: Harry Potter
line: You tell me.

name: Hermione Granger
line: He looks different, don't you think?  Draco.  Almost... ill.

name: Harry Potter
line: Who could tell the difference?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Lav, c'mon. Of course I'll wear it.

name: Lavender Brown
line: That's my Won-Won.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Excuse me, I have to go vomit.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgeable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

name: Tom Riddle
line: Intuition.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Good gracious, look at the time. Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

name: Tom Riddle
line: I know a secret shortcut or two.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

name: Tom Riddle
line: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Go on.

name: Tom Riddle
line: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic, and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I don't know anything about such things and I wouldn't tell you if I did!  Now get out of here at once and don't ever let me catch you mentioning it again!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Confused?  I would be surprised if you weren't.

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't understand -- what happened?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: This is perhaps the most important memory I've collected.  It's also a lie. This memory has been tampered with.  In this case by the person whose memory it is, our friend Professor Slughorn.

name: Harry Potter
line: But why would he tamper with his own memory?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I suspect he is ashamed of it.

name: Harry Potter
line: Why?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Why indeed.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I asked you to get to know Professor Slughorn and you've done so.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Now I want you to persuade him to divulge his true memory.  Any way you can.

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't know him that well, sir --

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: You're the Chosen One, Harry.  And Horace is, at heart, a decent man. Provide the proper circumstances and he will confess his sins.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: This memory is everything, Harry. Without it, we are blind. Without it, we leave the fate of our world to chance.  You have no choice. You must not fail.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Now don't forget to look over the chapter on antidotes.  I'll be poisoning one of you next time we meet.  I'm joking!  Off you go! Don't forget your rattails, Miss Alys.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Ah! If it isn't the Prince of Potions himself!  To what do I owe the pleasure?

name: Harry Potter
line: Well, sir, I wondered if I might ask you something.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Ask away, my dear boy, ask away!

name: Harry Potter
line: Well, you see, the other day I was in the Restricted Section -- in the library -- and I stumbled upon something rather odd while reading.  Something about a bit of rare magic...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Yes?  And exactly what was this rare magic.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm not sure... That is, I don't recall the name... exactly.  But it got me wondering... Are there some kinds of magic you're not allowed to teach?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I'm a Potions Professor, Harry. Perhaps your question would best be posed to Professor Snape.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, well, we don't exactly see eye-to-eye, sir.  What I mean to say is, he's not like you.  He might... misunderstand.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: There can be no light without the dark.  And so it is with magic. Myself, I have always strived to live within the light.  I suggest you do the same.

name: Harry Potter
line: Did you say the same to Tom Riddle, sir?  When he came asking questions.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Dumbledore put you up to this. Didn't he?  Didn't he!

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir --

name: Hermione Granger
line: Dead. Did you actually expect you could just walk up to Ol' Sluggy and ask him to reveal his deepest, darkest secret?  Honestly, Harry, sometimes I think the Daily Prophet should call you the Dim One.

name: Harry Potter
line: Nice.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You're going to have to persuade him somehow.  And now, I'm afraid, you've made it a lot harder.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione.  I think Malfoy's leaving the castle.

name: Harry Potter
line: I've seen it.  Sometimes... sometimes he just disappears off the Map.

name: Hermione Granger
line: That's... not possible.  No one can leave the castle these days. The Map is wrong.

name: Harry Potter
line: The Map is never wrong.

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's beautiful, isn't it?  The moon.

name: Harry Potter
line: Divine.  Had ourselves a little late-night snack, did we?

name: Ron Weasley
line: It was on your bed.  The box. Thought I'd try one...

name: Harry Potter
line: Or twenty.

name: Ron Weasley
line: I can't stop thinking about her, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Really?  Honestly, I reckoned she was starting to annoy you.

name: Ron Weasley
line: She could never annoy me.  I think... I think I love her.

name: Harry Potter
line: Excuse me?

name: Harry Potter
line: Well... Brilliant.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Do you think she knows I exist?

name: Harry Potter
line: Bloody well hope so.  She's been snogging you for three months.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Snogging?  Who're you talking about?

name: Harry Potter
line: Who're you talking about?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Romilda, of course.  Romilda Vane.

name: Harry Potter
line: Okay.  Very funny.

name: Harry Potter
line: What the hell was that for?

name: Ron Weasley
line: It's no joke!  I'm in love with her!

name: Harry Potter
line: Okay!  Fine!  You're in love with her!  Have you ever actually met her!

name: Ron Weasley
line: No.  Can you introduce me?

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron, these chocolates, they're -- C'mon.  I'm going to introduce you to Romilda Vane.

name: Ron Weasley
line: How do I look?

name: Harry Potter
line: Devastatingly handsome.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Damn it all!

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Yes???!!!! Oh.  Potter.  It's you.  I'm afraid I'm busy at the moment --

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir.  I'm sorry.  I wouldn't bother you if it weren't absolutely --

name: Ron Weasley
line: Where's Romilda?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: What's the matter with Wenby?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Ah.  Very well.  Bring him in.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I'd have thought you could whip up a remedy for this in no time, Harry -- an expert potioneer like you.

name: Harry Potter
line: I figured this called for a more practiced hand, sir.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hello, darling.  Fancy a drink?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Hm.  Perhaps you're right.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm sorry, sir.  About the other day.  Our... misunderstanding.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Yes, well, water under the bridge as they say, correct?

name: Harry Potter
line: I mean, I'm sure you're tired of it, after all these years.  The questions.  About... Voldemort.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I'll ask you not to use that name.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, sir.  It's just, well, Dumbledore once said that fear of a name only increases fear of the thing itself.  It seemed sensible.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: With all due respect, Dumbledore sometimes forgets that most of us do not possess powers so great that we can risk offending the most dangerous Dark Lord who ever lived.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Alright, m'boy!  Bottoms up!

name: Ron Weasley
line: What's this?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: A tonic for the nerves.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What happened to me?

name: Harry Potter
line: Love potion.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: And a bloody strong one at that.

name: Ron Weasley
line: I feel really... bad.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Pick-me-up's what you need, m'boy. Do us all good, I think.  I've got butterbeer, wine -- ah -- and a dazzling oak-matured mead.  I had other intentions for this but given the circumstances...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: There we are, Potter.  To life!

name: Harry Potter
line: Ron!  Ron!!!  Professor, help him!

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I d-don't understand --

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor!  Do something!!

name: Harry Potter
line: He's choking!!

name: Harry Potter
line: Breathe!  C'mon, Ron, don't be a prat.  Breathe!  BREATHE!

name: Ron Weasley
line: These girls are gonna kill me, Harry.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Quick thinking on your part, Harry.  Using a Bezoar.  You must be very proud of your student, eh, Horace?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Hm?  Oh.  Yes... very proud.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: I think we all agree that Mr. Potter's actions were heroic.  The question is:  Why were they necessary.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Why indeed.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: This appears to be a gift, Horace. You don't by chance remember who gave you this bottle, do you -- which by the way possesses remarkably subtle hints of licorice and cherry when not polluted with poison.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Actually I had intended to give it as a gift myself.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: To whom might I ask?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: You, Headmaster.

name: Lavender Brown
line: Where is he?  Where's my Won-Won! Has he been asking for me? What's she doing here?

name: Hermione Granger
line: I might ask you the same.

name: Lavender Brown
line: I happen to be his girlfriend.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I happen to be his... friend.

name: Lavender Brown
line: Don't make me laugh.  You haven't spoken in weeks.  I suppose you want to make up with him now that he's suddenly all interesting.

name: Hermione Granger
line: He's been poisoned, you daft dimbo! And for the record, I've always found him interesting.

name: Lavender Brown
line: Ha!  See? He senses my presence. I'm here, Won-Won. I'm here --

name: Ron Weasley
line: Er... My... Nee... Er!  My!  Nee!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Ah, to be young and feel love's keen sting.  Come, everyone, I think Mr. Weasley is well tended.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: 'Bout time, don't you think?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I've always cherished my students. They're my life...

name: Hermione Granger
line: Oh shut up.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron.  Stop.  You're making it snow.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Huh?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Tell me again how I broke up with Lavender?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Um, well, she came to visit you in the hospital, you see, and you talked -- I don't believe it was a long conversation --

name: Ron Weasley
line: Don't get me wrong.  I'm bloody thrilled to be shot of her.  It's just she seems... a bit put out.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Does, doesn't she?  And you say you don't remember a thing from that night?  Not one thing?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Well... there is... something. But no.  It can't be.  Besides, I was completely boggled, wasn't I?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Right.  Boggled...

name: Hermione Granger
line: That's Katie.  That's Katie Bell.

name: Harry Potter
line: How are you, Katie?

name: Katie Bell
line: Give me a moment, girls.

name: Katie Bell
line: I know you're going to ask, Harry. But I don't know who cursed me. I've tried to remember.  Honestly. But I just... can't...

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Cruci--

name: Harry Potter
line: Sectumsempra!

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Don't touch me!  Don't you dare touch me!

name: Ginny Weasley
line: You have to get rid of it.  Today.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Take my hand.

name: Harry Potter
line: The Room of Requirement...

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Over the years, if someone had a secret, if they wanted to conceal something, this is where they came.  Some of these things are almost as old as the castle itself.

name: Harry Potter
line: Who showed you this?  First.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Fred and George.  First year.  I hid Tom Riddle's diary here for a time.  Wish I'd left it...

name: Ginny Weasley
line: What was that?

name: Ginny Weasley
line: See, you never know what you'll find up here.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: All right.  Close your eyes.  That way you can't be tempted.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: There's something else.  Another secret of sorts.  One of mine...

name: Ginny Weasley
line: That can stay hidden up here too, if you like.

name: Ron Weasley
line: So.  Did you and Ginny do it?

name: Harry Potter
line: What?

name: Ron Weasley
line: You know.  Hide the book.

name: Harry Potter
line: Oh.  Yeah.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Still no luck with Slughorn, I take it?

name: Harry Potter
line: Say that again.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Well?  How do you feel?

name: Harry Potter
line: Excellent.  Really excellent.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Now remember.  Slughorn usually eats early, takes a short walk and then returns to his office.

name: Harry Potter
line: Right.  I'm going down to Hagrid's.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What?  No, Harry -- you've got to go see Slughorn.  We have a plan --

name: Harry Potter
line: No.  I've got a good feeling about going to Hagrid's.  I feel like it's the place to be tonight, know what I mean?

name: Hermione Granger
line: No.

name: Ron Weasley
line: No.

name: Harry Potter
line: Trust me.  I know what I'm doing. Or at least Felix does.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Merlin's beard, Harry!

name: Harry Potter
line: Sorry, sir.  I should've announced myself.  Cleared my throat. Coughed.  You probably feared I was Madam Sprout.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Well, yes, actually -- Why would you think that?

name: Harry Potter
line: Just the general behavior, sir. The sneaking around.  The jumping when you saw me.  By the way, those Tentacula leaves -- they're quite valuable, aren't they?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Ten galleons a leaf to the right buyer -- not that I'm familiar with such back alley transactions. One hears rumors is all.  My own interests are purely academic, of course.

name: Harry Potter
line: Personally, these plants have always kind of freaked me out.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Exactly how did you get out of the castle, Harry?

name: Harry Potter
line: Through the front doors, sir.  I'm off to Hagrid's, you see.  He's a very dear friend and I felt like paying him a visit.  So if you don't mind, I'll be going.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Harry!

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: It's nearly nightfall.  Surely you realize I can't allow you to roam the grounds all by yourself.

name: Harry Potter
line: Well, then by all means come along, sir.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Harry, I must insist you accompany me back to the castle immediately!

name: Harry Potter
line: That would be counterproductive, sir.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: And what makes you say that?

name: Harry Potter
line: No idea.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Merlin's beard...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Is that an actual Acromantula?

name: Harry Potter
line: A dead one, I think, sir.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: 'Arry.  'Orace.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: My god, dear man.  How did you ever manage to kill it?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Kill 'im! Me oldest friend, 'e was!

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I'm sorry, I... didn't realize.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Ah, don' worry yerself.  Yer not alone.  Seriously misunderstood creatures -- spiders.  It's the eyes, I reckon.  Unnerve people.

name: Harry Potter
line: Not to mention the pincers.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: I reckon that too... How'd yeh get outta the castle anyways?

name: Harry Potter
line: Through the front doors.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Hagrid.  I wouldn't want to be indelicate, but Acromantula venom is uncommonly rare and, well, if you wouldn't mind my extracting a vial or two -- purely for academic pursuits...

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Don' suppose it's doin' 'im any good, izzit?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: My thoughts exactly!  Always carry a few spare ampoules for just such occasions.  Old Potion Master's habit, you know...

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Wish yeh coulda seen 'im in 'is prime.  Magnificent 'e was.  Jus' magnificent...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Why don't I say a few words?  I trust he had family?

name: Harry Potter
line: Oh yeah.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Farewell...

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Aragog.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Farewell, Aragog, king of arachnids.  Though your body will decay, your spirit lingers on in the quiet, web-spun places of your Forest home.  May your many-eyed descendents ever flourish and your human friends find solace for the loss they have sustained.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Tha' was... tha' was... beautiful.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: And Odo the hero, they bore him back home...

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: To the place he'd known as a lad, They laid him to rest with his hat inside out and his wand snapped in two, which was sad...

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: I had 'im from an egg, yeh know. Tiny little thing he was when he hatched.  No bigger'n a Pekinese.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Sweet.  I once had a fish. Francis.  Lovely little thing. One day I came downstairs and he'd vanished.  Poof.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Tha's odd.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Isn't it?  That's life, I suppose. One goes along and then... poof.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: That's never unicorn hair, Hagrid?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Hagrid looks up, reels a bit.  Nods.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: But my dear chap, do you know how much that's worth?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: No idea... no idea at all...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: It was a student who gave me Francis.  One spring afternoon I discovered a bowl upon my desk with a few inches of clear water. There was a flower petal floating upon the surface.  As I watched, the petal sank, but just before it touched bottom... it transformed. Into a wee fish.  It was beautiful magic, wondrous to behold.  The petal had come from a lily.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Your mother.  The day I came downstairs, the day I found the bowl empty... was the day she...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I know what you want.  But I can't give it to you.  It will ruin me...

name: Harry Potter
line: Do you know why I survived?  The night I got this.

name: Harry Potter
line: Because of her.  Because she sacrificed herself.  Because she refused to step aside.  Because her love was more powerful than Voldemort.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Please don't say his --

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm not afraid of the name, Professor.  And I'm not afraid of him.  And you shouldn't be either. She didn't just die for me that night.  She died for you too.  She died for everyone who's ever woken in the middle of the night afraid a Death Eater waited on their doorstep.

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor.  I'm going to tell you something, something others have only guessed at.  It's true.  I am the Chosen One.

name: Harry Potter
line: Only I can kill him.  But in order to do so, I need to know what Tom Riddle asked you that night in your office all those years ago. And I need to know what you told him.

name: Harry Potter
line: Be brave, Professor.  Be brave like my mother.  Otherwise you disgrace her.  Otherwise she died for nothing.  Otherwise, the bowl remains empty forever.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Don't think too badly of me once you've seen it.  You don't know what he was like... even then.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: How is he?  Horace?

name: Tom Riddle
line: Sir, is it true that Professor Merrythought is retiring?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Now, Tom, I couldn't tell you if I knew, could I?  I must say, m'boy, I'd like to know where you get your information.  More knowledgable than half the staff, you are. By the way, thank you for the pineapple -- you're quite right, it is my favorite -- how is it you knew?

name: Tom Riddle
line: Intuition.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Good gracious, is it that time already?  Off you go, boys, or Professor Dippett will have us all in detention.  Lestrange, Avery, don't forget your essays...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Look sharp, Tom.  You don't want to be caught out of bed after hours...

name: Tom Riddle
line: I know a secret shortcut or two.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Yes, I imagine you do.  Something on your mind, Tom?

name: Tom Riddle
line: Yes, sir.  I couldn't think of anyone else to go to.  The other Professors, well, they're not like you.  They might... misunderstand.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Go on.

name: Tom Riddle
line: I was in the library the other night, in the Restricted section, and I read something rather odd, about a bit of rare magic and I thought perhaps you could illuminate me.  It's called, as I understand it... a Horcrux.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Excuse me?

name: Tom Riddle
line: Horcrux.  I came across the term while reading and I didn't fully understand it.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I'm not sure what you were reading, Tom, but that's very Dark stuff, very Dark indeed.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Yes, sir.  Which is why I came to you.  I mean no disrespect to the rest of the staff, but I thought if anyone could tell me... it would be you.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: A Horcrux is an object in which a person has concealed part of their soul.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Yes, I thought it might be something like that.  But I don't understand how that works, sir.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: One splits one's soul and hides part of it in an object.  By doing so, you are protected should you be attacked and your body destroyed.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Protected?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: That part of your soul that was hidden, lives on.  In other words, you cannot die.

name: Tom Riddle
line: How does one split his soul, sir?

name: Horace Slughorn
line: I think you can guess the answer to that, Tom.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Murder.

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Yes.  Killing rips the soul apart. It is a violation against nature. After, one is never the same.

name: Tom Riddle
line: Out of curiosity, sir -- can you only split your soul once?  For instance, isn't seven the most powerfully magical number --

name: Horace Slughorn
line: Seven!  Merlin's beard, Tom! Isn't it bad enough to think of killing one person?  To rip the soul into seven pieces...

name: Horace Slughorn
line: This is all hypothetical, isn't it, Tom?  All academic...

name: Tom Riddle
line: Of course, sir.  And I promise I'll not speak of our conversation.  It'll be our little secret...

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir --

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: This is beyond anything I imagined.  In my life I have seen things that are unimaginably horrific.  I know now... you will see worse.

name: Harry Potter
line: Do you mean to say he succeeded, sir?  In making a Horcrux?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Oh he succeeded.  And not just once.  Think, Harry.  He's just told us.

name: Harry Potter
line: Seven.  He made seven -- the most powerfully magical number.  But... what are they exactly?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: They can be anything.  The most commonplace of objects.  A ring, for example.  Or a book...

name: Harry Potter
line: Tom Riddle's diary --

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: It's a Horcrux, yes.  Four years ago, when you saved Ginny Weasley's life in the Chamber of Secrets, when you brought me this I knew.  This was a different kind of magic.  Very dark.  Very powerful.  But until tonight, I had no idea just how powerful...

name: Harry Potter
line: And the ring...?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Belonged to Voldemort's mother. It was difficult to find and...

name: Harry Potter
line: ... even more difficult to destroy. But if you could find them all. If you did destroy each Horcrux...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: One destroys Voldemort.

name: Harry Potter
line: But how would you find them?  They could be hidden anywhere, couldn't they...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: True.  But magic, especially Dark magic...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: ... leaves traces.

name: Harry Potter
line: It's where you've been going, isn't it, sir?  When you leave the school.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Yes.  And I think... perhaps... I may have found another.  But this time I cannot hope to destroy it alone.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Once again, I shall ask too much of you.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry.  It's time.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hermione, is the Room of Requirement unplottable?

name: Hermione Granger
line: If one wants it to be.  Why?

name: Harry Potter
line: It would explain why I thought Malfoy was leaving the castle when he disappeared off the Map.

name: Harry Potter
line: He was going to the Room of Requirement.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Of course, and that explains the Vanishing Cabinet as well!

name: Ron Weasley
line: No.  I got an owl from Dad this morning.  The one at Borgin & Burke's?  It's still there.

name: Harry Potter
line: But I'm telling you.  I saw it --

name: Harry Potter
line: What if there are two?  Vanishing cabinets.

name: Hermione Granger
line: What if there are?

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't know...

name: Ron Weasley
line: Good luck, mate.

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't need luck.  I'll be with Dumbledore.

name: Severus Snape
line: Have you ever considered that you ask too much?  That you take too much for granted?  Has it ever crossed your brilliant mind that I don't want to do this anymore?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Whether it has or hasn't is irrelevant.  I will not negotiate this with you, Severus.  You agreed.  There's nothing more to discuss.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Harry.  You need a shave, my friend.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: At times I forget how much you've grown.  At times I still see the small boy from the cupboard. Forgive my mawkishness, Harry.  I am an old man.

name: Harry Potter
line: You look the same to me, sir.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Like your mother, you are unfailingly kind.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: A trait people never fail to undervalue.  I'm afraid.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: The place to which we journey tonight is exceedingly dangerous, Harry.  I promised that you could accompany me and I stand by that promise.  But there is a condition:  You must obey any command I give you -- without question.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes, sir.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Understand what I'm saying. Should I tell you to hide, you must hide.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Should I tell you to run, you will run.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: And should I tell you to abandon me and save yourself...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: You will do so.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Your word, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: My word.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Take my arm.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir, I thought one couldn't Apparate within Hogwarts.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Being me has its privileges.

name: Harry Potter
line: It's there, isn't it?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: This is the place.  Oh yes, this place has known magic. Where you stand, Harry, Tom Riddle once stood many, many years ago, when he was but a poor orphan boy with a penchant for cruelty...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: One wintry afternoon, he lured two younger classmates to this cave. What happened is unclear.  But this much is known:  the children were damaged.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: In order to gain passage, payment must be made, payment intended to weaken any intruder.

name: Harry Potter
line: You should've let me, sir.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Oh, no, Harry.  Your blood is much more precious than mine.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Careful.  The water.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: It's there.  The only question is how do we get to it?

name: Harry Potter
line: We couldn't, perhaps, just try a Summoning Charm, sir?

name: Harry Potter
line: Accio Horcrux!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Perhaps not.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: If you would, Harry...

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir... have you ever taken Felix Felicis?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Only recreationally.  You see, I believe one creates one's own luck.

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor... there are bodies in this lake.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Yes.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Remember... the water.

name: Harry Potter
line: Do you think the Horcrux is in there, sir?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Oh yes.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: It has to be drunk.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: You remember the condition on which I brought you with me? This potion might paralyze me.  It might cause me to forget why I'm here.  It might create so much pain I beg for relief.  You are not to indulge these requests, Harry.  It is your job to make sure I keep drinking this potion even if you have to force it down my throat.  Understood?

name: Harry Potter
line: Why can't I drink it, sir?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Because I am much older, much cleverer... and much less valuable. Your good health, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor?

name: Harry Potter
line: Professor?  Can you hear me?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Don't... don't make me...

name: Harry Potter
line: You... you can't stop, Professor. You've got to keep drinking.  Like you said.  Remember.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Nooooooo!!!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Make it stop... Please... make it stop...

name: Harry Potter
line: It will, sir.  It'll stop.  But only if you drink...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: My fault.  It's all my fault...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Too much... I can't... take it... I want... to die... kill... kill me... KILL ME, HARRY!

name: Harry Potter
line: What?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Your word, Harry!  Your word!

name: Harry Potter
line: No...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Kill me!  It's the only way!

name: Harry Potter
line: One more.  Just one more.  And then -- I promise... I'll do what you say.

name: Harry Potter
line: I promise.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Water. Water...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Aguamenti.

name: Harry Potter
line: You did it, sir.  Look --

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Water!

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm trying, sir.  I'm --

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Go...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: We have to... go.

name: Harry Potter
line: Don't worry, sir.  We're nearly there.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I am not worried, Harry.  I am with you.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: To your Houses.  No dawdling.

name: Harry Potter
line: We need to get you up to the hospital, sir, to Madam Pomfrey --

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: No.  Severus... Severus is who I need... Go and wake him... Tell him what has happened...

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Speak to no one else... I... I shall wait here...

name: Harry Potter
line: All right.  Okay.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir, are you... praying?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: No, Harry.  I do not pray.  I was merely closing a window -- the one that had allowed us to Apparate.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Hide yourself below.  And do not speak or show yourself without my permission.  No matter what.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Do as I say, Harry.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Trust me.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Good evening, Draco.  What brings you out on such a fine Spring evening?  Or is it Summer?

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Who else is here?  I heard you talking.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: I often talk aloud to myself.  I find it extraordinarily useful. That which sounds sane at a whisper can seem utterly mad when said for all the world to hear. Haven't been whispering to yourself, have you, Draco?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: You are not an assassin, Draco.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: How do you know what I am?  I've done things that would shock you.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Like cursing Katie Bell and hoping she would, in turn, bear a cursed necklace to me?  Like replacing a bottle of mead with one laced with poison.  Forgive me, Draco, but these are attempts so feeble I cannot help but question if your heart has been really in them. I'm curious.  When Voldemort gave you this task, when he asked you to kill me, was it in a whisper?

name: Draco Malfoy
line: He trusts me!  I was chosen!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Then I shall make it easy for you.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: Expelliarumus!

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Well done, Draco.  But I warn you. Killing is not nearly as easy.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: You're not alone.  Are you.  There are others.  How?

name: Draco Malfoy
line: The Vanishing Cabinet in the Room of Requirement.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: That cabinet has been broken for years.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: I've been mending it.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Ingenious.  Let me guess.  It has a sister.  A twin.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: In Borgin & Burkes.  They form --

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: A passage, yes.  Very good. I once knew a boy years ago who made all the wrong choices.  Let me help you, Draco.

name: Draco Malfoy
line: I don't want your help!  Don't you see!  I have to do it!  I have to! I've got to kill you or he'll kill me.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Say that again, Draco.  But aloud this time.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: Well now, look what we have here. Dumbledore.  Wandless and alone.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: Cornered in his own castle.  Well done, Draco.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Good evening, Bellatrix.  I think introductions are in order.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: Love to, Albus.  But I'm afraid we're on a bit of a tight schedule.

name: Fenrir Greyback
line: Do it.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: He doesn't have the stomach.  Like his father.  Let me finish him. In my own way.

name: Severus Snape
line: No!  The Dark Lord was clear.  The boy's to do it.  Go on, Draco. Now!

name: Severus Snape
line: No.

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Severus...

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: Well, look who's here.  Hogwarts own Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.  Come to see the slaughter?

name: Albus Dumbledore
line: Severus... please.

name: Severus Snape
line: I gave my word.  I made a vow...

name: Severus Snape
line: Avada Kedavra!

name: Severus Snape
line: You can no longer stay here.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: Boo.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: Draco!  Draco! They'll kill you if you stay.

name: Severus Snape
line: Go on!

name: Severus Snape
line: Go on!

name: Harry Potter
line: Cruciatus!

name: Harry Potter
line: Incacerata!

name: Harry Potter
line: Impedimenta!

name: Harry Potter
line: Fight!  Fight back, you coward!

name: Severus Snape
line: Don't ever associate that word and my name again.

name: Severus Snape
line: No!  He belongs to the Dark Lord!

name: Harry Potter
line: Sectumsempra!

name: Severus Snape
line: You dare use my own spells against me, Potter?

name: Severus Snape
line: You may have gotten your mother's eyes, but you're as dim as your father.  Yes.  It's me.  I'm the Half-Blood Prince.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid... HAGRID!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid!  You alright?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Take more'n tha' ter finish me off.  Not sure about me 'ouse, tho'.  But if anybody can put it righ', Dumbledore can.

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid, Dumbledore --

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Only thing I can't reckon is wha' Snape was doin' with tha' lot.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: An' wha's this wi' the Dark Mar'? Who's been killed? Where's Dumbledore, 'arry? Where's Dumbledore!!

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Potter.

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: Potter, in light of what's happened... should you feel the need to talk to someone...

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: You should know... Professor Dumbledore...

name: Minerva McGonagall
line: You meant a great deal to him.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Dumbledore.

name: Harry Potter
line: Do you think he would've done it. Draco?

name: Harry Potter
line: No.  He was lowering his wand.  In the end, it was Snape.  It was always Snape.  And I did nothing...

name: Hermione Granger
line: Strange.  Thinking this is a piece of Voldemort's soul...

name: Harry Potter
line: Yeah, strange.  Only... it's not. It's a fake.

name: Harry Potter
line: Go on.  Open it.

name: Hermione Granger
line: 'To the Dark Lord.  I know I will be dead long before you read this but I want you to know that it was I who discovered your secret.  I have stolen the real Horcrux and intend to destroy it as soon as I can.  I face death in the hope that when you meet your match, you will be mortal once more.  R.A.B.'

name: Harry Potter
line: Dunno.  But whoever they are, they have the real Horcrux.  Which means, it was a waste.  All of it.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron's okay with it, you know.  You and Ginny.  But if I were you, when he's around, I'd keep the snogging to a minimum.

name: Harry Potter
line: I'm not coming back, Hermione.

name: Hermione Granger
line: We reckoned -- Ron and me.

name: Harry Potter
line: I have to finish what Dumbledore started. I'm not sure where that will lead me... but I'll let you and Ron konw where I am -- when I can.

name: Hermione Granger
line: I've always admired your courage, Harry, but sometimes... you're really thick.

name: Hermione Granger
line: You don't honestly think you can find all those Horcruxes by yourself, do you? You need us, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
line: Yeah.  I do.  But do me a favor. When I'm around?  Keep the snogging to a minimum.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Like that's going to happen.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Besides, he's barking.

name: Harry Potter
line: Funny, he says the same about you.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Yes, but I'm exceptionally perceptive.

name: Harry Potter
line: You're brilliant.  You both are.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Do you think we'll ever... come back?

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't know. I never realised how beautiful this place was.

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: These are dark times, there is no denying.  Our world has perhaps faced no greater threat than it does today.  But I say this to our citizenry:  we, ever your servants, continue to defend your liberty and repel the forces that would seek to take it from you. Your Ministry remains strong...

name: Mrs. Granger
line: Hermione.  Your tea is ready, dear.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Coming, Mum.

name: Mrs. Granger
line: Don't you look lovely.  All packed?

name: Mr. Granger
line: Are you sure these biscuits are sugar-free?

name: Mrs. Granger
line: Quite sure, dear.  See the big bold letters that say 'Sugar Free'?  Dead giveaway.

name: Mr. Granger
line: Mm.  Yes. Hello, kitten.  Don't you look lovely.

name: Mrs. Granger
line: Darling, don't be suspicious the biscuits taste so good, be grateful the company's so clever...

name: Hermione Granger
line: Obliviate.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Goodbye.

name: Ron Weasley
line: What are those?

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Close the door.

name: Arthur Weasley
line: These are for the Order.  So many are on the run now, it helps them to stay connected with the rest of us.  Know they're not alone...

name: Ron Weasley
line: C'mon.  Mum's got dinner ready.

name: Voldemort
line: Severus.  I was beginning to worry you'd lost your way.  Come.  I've saved you a seat.

name: Voldemort
line: You know our hosts, of course, Severus.  Narcissa in particular has been most hospitable.  Lucius, on the other hand, is, I fear, burdened by my presence.  Are you, Lucius?

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: My lord?

name: Voldemort
line: Are you burdened?

name: Narcissa Malfoy
line: My lord is always welcome here.

name: Voldemort
line: You bring news I trust, Severus?

name: Severus Snape
line: It will happen Saturday next.  At nightfall.

name: Voldemort
line: And this information comes --

name: Severus Snape
line: -- from the source we discussed.

name: Corban Yaxley
line: I have heard differently, my lord. Dawlish, the Auror, let slip that the Potter boy will not be moved until the thirtieth of this month, the night before he turns seventeen.

name: Severus Snape
line: This is a false trail.  The Auror Office no longer plays any part in the protection of Harry Potter. Those closest to him believe we have infiltrated the Ministry.

name: Death Eater
line: Well, they've got that right, then, 'aven't they?

name: Voldemort
line: Pius, what say you?

name: Pius Thicknesse
line: One hears many things, my lord. Whether the truth is among them is not clear.

name: Voldemort
line: Spoken like a true politician. You will, I think, prove most useful, Pius.  Where will he be taken?  The boy?

name: Severus Snape
line: To a safehouse.  Likely the home of someone in the Order.  I'm told it has been given every manner of protection possible. Once there, it will be impractical to attack him.  We may have compromised the Ministry, but there are those who remain loyal to him.  As long as the Ministry stands, his allies within will have the means at their disposal to insure his safety.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
line: My lord, if I might, I'd like to volunteer myself for this task. I'd like to kill the boy.

name: Voldemort
line: Wormtail!  Have I not spoken to you about keeping our guest quiet?

name: Peter Pettigrew
line: Yes, m-my lord.  Right away, my lord.

name: Voldemort
line: As inspiring as I find your bloodlust, Bellatrix, I must be the one to kill Harry Potter.  But I face an unfortunate complication.  It has recently come to my attention that my wand and Potter's share the same core. They are, in some ways, twins.  We can wound but not fatally harm one another.  Which means, if I am to kill him... I will have to do it with another's wand.

name: Voldemort
line: Come now.  Surely one of you would like the honor?  What about... you, Lucius?

name: Voldemort
line: I require your wand.

name: Voldemort
line: Do I detect elm?

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: Yes, my lord.

name: Voldemort
line: And the core?

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: Dragon -- dragon heartstring.

name: Voldemort
line: My wand?  You can't possibly think I would give you my wand.

name: Lucius Malfoy
line: No, my lord.

name: Voldemort
line: For those of you who do not know, we are joined tonight by Miss Charity Burbage who until recently taught at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.  Her specialty was Muggle studies. It is Miss Burbage's belief that Muggles are not so different from us.

name: Voldemort
line: She would, given her way, have us mate with them.  To her, the mixture of magical and Muggle blood is not an abomination but something to be encouraged.  I, of course, take a contrary view.  But we're all civilized here.  All adults.  We can agree to disagree.

name: Charity Burbage
line: Severus, please.  We're friends...

name: Voldemort
line: Avada Kedavra!

name: Voldemort
line: Nagini... Dinner.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Come now, Dudley.  Hurry up!

name: Harry Potter
line: Time for the teary farewell.

name: Petunia Dursley
line: I've lived in this house twenty years.  And now -- in a single night -- I'm expected to leave.

name: Harry Potter
line: They'll torture you.  Even Dudley. If they think you know where I'm going, they'll stop at noth--

name: Petunia Dursley
line: You think I don't know that?  You think I don't know what they're capable of?

name: Petunia Dursley
line: You didn't just lose a mother that night in Godric's Hollow, you know.  I lost a sister.

name: Harry Potter
line: Do you have any?  Magic?

name: Petunia Dursley
line: What a cruel thing to ask.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Well, this is goodbye then, boy.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: I don't understand.  Isn't he coming with us?

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Who?

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Harry.

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Absolutely not.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: Why?

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Well, because -- he doesn't want to, do you, boy?

name: Harry Potter
line: Absolutely not.  Besides, I'm just a waste of space.  Isn't that right, Vernon?

name: Vernon Dursley
line: Come on, Dudley, we're off.

name: Dudley Dursley
line: I don't think you're a waste of space.

name: Harry Potter
line: Well... thanks.

name: Harry Potter
line: See you, Big D.

name: Harry Potter
line: Good riddance.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: All righ', 'arry?  Yeh look fit.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Yeah, he's ruddy gorgeous.  What say we get undercover before someone murders him.

name: Harry Potter
line: I thought you were looking after the Prime Minister, Kingsley.

name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
line: You're more important.

name: Bill Weasley
line: Hello, Harry.  Bill Weasley.

name: Fred Weasley
line: Wasn't always this handsome.

name: George Weasley
line: Dead ugly.

name: Bill Weasley
line: True enough.  Owe it all to a werewolf by name of Greyback. Hope to repay the favor one day.

name: Fleur Delacour
line: You are still beautiful to me, William.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Just remember, Fleur, once you're married:  Bill takes his steaks on the raw side now.

name: Nymphadora Tonks
line: My husband, the joker.  By the way, wait until you hear the news! Remus and I are --

name: Alastor Moody
line: All right, all right!  You'll all have time for a cozy catch-up later!  We've got to get the hell out of here and soon!

name: Alastor Moody
line: Potter, you're underage, which means you've still got the Trace on you.

name: Harry Potter
line: The Trace?

name: Alastor Moody
line: You sneeze and the Ministry will know who wipes your nose.  Point is, we have to use those means of transport the Trace can't detect: brooms, thestrals and the like. We'll go in pairs.  That way if anyone's out there waiting for us -- and I reckon there will be -- they won't know which Harry Potter is the real one.

name: Harry Potter
line: The real one...?

name: Alastor Moody
line: I believe you're familiar with this particular brew.

name: Harry Potter
line: No!  Absolutely not!

name: Hermione Granger
line: I told you he'd take it well.

name: Harry Potter
line: If you think I'm going to let people risk their lives for me --

name: Ron Weasley
line: Never done that before, have we?

name: Harry Potter
line: This is different.  Taking that. Becoming me -- no.

name: Fred Weasley
line: Well, none of us really fancy it, mate.

name: George Weasley
line: Yeah, imagine if something went wrong and we were stuck as scrawny, specky gits forever.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Everyone here's of age, Potter, and they've all agreed to take the risk.

name: Mundungus Fletcher
line: Technically, I've been coerced. Mundungus Fletcher, Mr. Potter. I've always been a huge admirer.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Nip it, Mundungus!  All right, Granger, as discussed.

name: Harry Potter
line: Blimey, Hermione!

name: Alastor Moody
line: Straight in here, if you please.

name: Alastor Moody
line: For those of you who haven't taken Polyjuice Potion before, fair warning.  It tastes like goblin piss.

name: Fred Weasley
line: Have a lot of experience with that, do you, Mad-Eye?

name: Fred Weasley
line: Just trying to defuse the tension.

name: Fred Weasley
line: Wow -- we're identical!

name: George Weasley
line: Wow -- we're identical!

name: Alastor Moody
line: Not yet you aren't.

name: George Weasley
line: Don't have something a bit more sporty, do you?

name: Fred Weasley
line: Yes, don't fancy this color at all.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Fancy this:  You're not you, so shut it and strip. You'll need to change too, Potter.

name: Fleur Delacour
line: Bill, look away -- I'm 'ideous.

name: Ron Weasley
line: I knew Ginny was lying about that tattoo.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Harry, your eyesight really is awful.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Blimey.  I almost forgot.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Right then.  We'll be pairing off. Each Potter will have a protector. As for you, Harry...

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes?

name: Alastor Moody
line: The real Harry!  Where the devil are you, anyway?

name: Harry Potter
line: Here.

name: Alastor Moody
line: You'll ride with Hagrid.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Brought yeh here sixteen years ago when you were barely bigger than a Bowtruckle. Seems only righ' I should be the one ter take yeh away.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Yeah, it's all very touching. Let's go.

name: Alastor Moody
line: Good luck, everyone.  On the count of three.  One... two --

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid!  We've got to help the others!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Can't do it, 'arry.  My job's ter get you where we're goin' safe 'n sound -- Mad-Eye's orders!

name: Harry Potter
line: What was that?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Dragon fire!

name: Death Eater
line: That's him!  The real one!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Hol' tight, 'arry!  We've got ter get yeh out of here!

name: Harry Potter
line: Hagrid... HAGRID...!

name: Voldemort
line: Avada...

name: Molly Weasley
line: Harry!  Hagrid!  What happened?! Have you seen the others?

name: Harry Potter
line: Is no one back yet?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: They were on us from the star', Molly -- the Death Eaters.  And You-Know-Who as well.

name: Molly Weasley
line: Well, thank goodness you two are all right.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Haven't go' any brandy, have yeh, Molly?  Fer medicinal purposes?

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Ron and Tonks should've already been back.  Dad and Fred as well.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Oh my God!  George!

name: Remus Lupin
line: The house!  Quickly!

name: Molly Weasley
line: My boy!  My darling boy!  What've they done to you?!

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Remus!  What're you doing!

name: Remus Lupin
line: What creature sat in the corner the first time that Harry Potter visited my office at Hogwarts!

name: Harry Potter
line: Are you mad...?

name: Remus Lupin
line: What Creature!

name: Harry Potter
line: A grindylow!

name: Remus Lupin
line: We've been betrayed.  Voldemort knew you were being moved tonight. I had to make sure you weren't an imposter.

name: Harry Potter
line: Who did this to him?

name: Remus Lupin
line: Snape. He'll be fine, Molly.  But that's Dark Magic.  The damage is done.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Someone else is back.

name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
line: The last words Albus Dumbledore spoke to the pair of us?

name: Remus Lupin
line: 'Harry is the best hope we have. Trust him.'

name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
line: What gave you away?

name: Harry Potter
line: Hedwig -- I think.  She was trying to protect me --

name: Ron Weasley
line: Hey ya -- Well... thanks.

name: Nymphadora Tonks
line: Deserves that.  Brilliant, he was. Wouldn't be standing here without him.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Really?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Always the tone of surprise.

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Are we the last?  Where's George?

name: Arthur Weasley
line: Remus.  Where's my son?

name: Fred Weasley
line: How do you feel, Georgie?

name: George Weasley
line: Saint-like.

name: Fred Weasley
line: Come again?

name: George Weasley
line: Saint-like... You see, I'm holy. Holey, Fred, geddit?

name: Fred Weasley
line: With the whole wide world of ear- related humor at your disposal, you go for holey?  Pathetic.

name: George Weasley
line: Reckon I'm still better-looking than you.  Better-looking than Bill, that's for sure.

name: Bill Weasley
line: Mad-Eye's dead.

name: Bill Weasley
line: Mundungus took one look at Voldemort and Disapparated.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Mad-Eye reckoned You-Know-Who would expect the real Harry to be with the most skilled Auror.  He knew he'd be in the most danger.

name: Arthur Weasley
line: It doesn't explain how they knew we were moving Harry tonight.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Wha'?  One of us?  Tha's mad.  I'd wager me life it wasn' none of you lot.  An' if it was me I'd kno', wouldn' I?  Talk in me sleep on occasion, I'll admit, but there's only Fang aroun' ter hear an' mostly it's gibberish an' besides I'd cut me tongue out 'fore 'd betray 'arry e'en in me dreams --

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: Wha's so funny!

name: Harry Potter
line: I trust you with my life, Hagrid. I trust everyone in this room. Understood?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
line: 'Ear, 'ear.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Better.

name: Garrick Ollivander
line: No!  No!  I believed a different wand would work, I swear!

name: Voldemont
line: Then explain this!

name: Garrick Ollivander
line: But it makes no sense...

name: Voldemort
line: Perhaps our friend's loyalties lie elsewhere, Wormtail.

name: Garrick Ollivander
line: No!  There must be a way!  I'll think of something else!

name: Voldemont
line: I hope so, Ollivander, for your sake.  I won't be so forgiving next time...

name: Ron Weasley
line: Going somewhere?

name: Harry Potter
line: No one else is going to die.  Not for me.

name: Ron Weasley
line: For you?  You think Madeye died for you?  You think George took that curse for you?  You may be the Chosen One, mate, but this is a whole lot bigger than that.

name: Harry Potter
line: Come with me.  Now.

name: Ron Weasley
line: And leave Hermione?  Are you mad? We wouldn't last two days without her.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Don't tell her I said that. Besides, you've still got the Trace on you.  And there's the wedding...

name: Harry Potter
line: Wedding?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Bill and Fleur.  Mum's been planning it for months.  Only thing that's kept her sane, I reckon.  She'll kill me if I miss it.  Kill you too.  Rather go face to face with You-Know-Who if I'm honest.

name: Harry Potter
line: I don't care about a bloody wedding -- no matter whose it is. I have to start searching for the Horcruxes.  It's the only chance we have to beat him.  And the longer we wait the stronger he gets.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Tonight's not the night, mate. You'd only be doing him a favor.

name: Ron Weasley
line: Do you think he knows?

name: Ron Weasley
line: I mean, they're bits of his soul, the Horcruxes.  Bits of him.  When Dumbledore destroyed the ring and you destroyed Tom Riddle's diary all those years ago -- he must've felt something right?

name: Ron Weasley
line: What I'm saying is, if we do this thing right, if we find the Horcruxes and begin to destroy them one by one...

name: Ron Weasley
line: Won't he know he's being hunted?

name: Arthur Weasley
line: All together now!

name: Arthur Weasley
line: One.  Two.  Three!

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Were you going to tell me?

name: Harry Potter
line: Yes.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: And Ron and Hermione.  They'll not be going back to Hogwarts either?

name: Ginny Weasley
line: I see.

name: Harry Potter
line: Dumbledore didn't want anyone to know what it is we're doing.  If I tell you, I'd be betraying him.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Zip me up, will you.

name: Ginny Weasley
line: Seems silly, doesn't it?  A wedding.  Given everything that's going on.

name: Harry Potter
line: Maybe that's the best reason to have it.  Because of everything that's going on.

name: George Weasley
line: Morning.

name: Arthur Weasley
line: How's it look on your end, boys?

name: Fred Weasley
line: Brilliant!

name: George Weasley
line: Bloody hell, what's the Minister of Magic doing here?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Dunno.  But something tells me he didn't come to give away the bride.

name: Harry Potter
line: To what do we owe the pleasure, Minister?

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: I think we both know the answer to that question, Mr. Potter.

name: Harry Potter
line: And this would be...?

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: Don't be coy, Mr. Potter.  Mr. Weasley.  Would you say you were close to your former Headmaster?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Dumbledore?  And me?  I dunno. I reckon I was just another Weasley to him.  He was always polite --

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: And you, Miss Granger?  How would you characterize your relationship?

name: Hermione Granger
line: We were friendly, not close like Harry, but --

name: Harry Potter
line: What's this all about?

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: This.  Despite the fact that neither of your friends appear to have been particularly close to their recently deceased Headmaster, he saw fit to remember them in his will.  Now why do you suppose that would be?

name: Harry Potter
line: No idea.

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: Come now, you don't expect me to believe...

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: 'Herein is set forth the Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore.  First, to Ronald Bilius Weasley, I leave my Deluminator, a device of my own making, in the hope that -- when things seem most dark -- it will show him the light.'

name: Ron Weasley
line: Dumbledore left this?  For me? Brilliant.  Er -- what is it?

name: Ron Weasley
line: Wicked.

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: 'To Miss Hermione Jean Granger, I leave my copy of The Tales of Beedle the Bard, in the hope that she will find it entertaining and instructive.'

name: Ron Weasley
line: Mum used to read me those!  The Wizard and the Hopping Pot, Babbitty Rabbity and her Cackling Stump...

name: Ron Weasley
line: Oh, c'mon!  Beedle's stories are famous!  Babbity Rabbitty? No...?

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: 'To Harry James Potter, I leave the Snitch he caught in his first Quidditch match at Hogwarts, as a reminder of the rewards of perseverance and skill.

name: Harry Potter
line: That's it then?

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: Not quite.  Dumbledore left you a second bequest:  The Sword of Godric Gryffindor.  Unfortunately, the Sword of Gryffindor was not Dumbledore's to give away.  As an important historical artifact, it belongs...

name: Hermione Granger
line: To Harry!  It belongs to Harry! It chose him!  It came to him in the Chamber of Secrets when he most needed it!

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: The sword may present itself to any worthy Gryffindor, Miss Granger.  That does not make it that wizard's property.  And in any event the current whereabouts of the sword are unknown.

name: Harry Potter
line: Excuse me?

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: The sword is missing. I won't pretend to be your friend, Mr. Potter.  But I assure you I'm not your enemy.

name: Harry Potter
line: You'll forgive me, Minister.  But it's a little hard to tell the difference these days.

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: Dumbledore said something very similar the last time we spoke.

name: Hermione Granger
line: Where is your guard, sir?

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
line: I came alone.  I don't really need them anymore...

name: Remus Lupin
line: We want you to be the godfather.

name: Harry Potter
line: You mean -- But that's brilliant -- I... don't know what to say.

name: Remus Lupin
line: Say yes.

name: Luna Lovegood
line: Hello, Harry!

name: Luna Lovegood
line: Oh, I've interrupted a deep thought, haven't I?  I can see it growing smaller in your eyes.

name: Harry Potter
line: No, 'course not.  How are you, Luna?

name: Luna Lovegood
line: Very well.  I was bitten by a garden gnome only moments ago.

name: Xenophilius Lovegood
line: Gnome saliva is enormously beneficial!  Xenophilius Lovegood. We live just over the hill!

name: Harry Potter
line: Nice to meet you, sir.

name: Xenophilius Lovegood
line: I trust you know, Mr. Potter, that we at The Quibbler, unlike those toadies at the Daily Prophet, fully supported Dumbledore during his lifetime and in his death support you just as fully.

name: Luna Lovegood
line: Come, Daddy.  Harry doesn't want to talk to us right now.  He's just too nice to say so.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir?  May I sit down?

name: Elphias Doge
line: Mr. Potter!  By all means!

name: Harry Potter
line: I found what you wrote in the Daily Prophet very moving, sir.  I take it you knew Professor Dumbledore well?

name: Elphias Doge
line: I certainly knew him the longest, if you don't count his brother Aberforth -- and somehow, people never do seem to count Aberforth.

name: Harry Potter
line: I never even knew he had a brother, sir.

name: Elphias Doge
line: Yes, well, Dumbledore was always very private.  Even as a boy.

name: Harry Potter
line: Sir, I was wondering if you'd had much contact with him before he died.

name: Elphias Doge
line: The occasional owl.  Though it was strange...

name: Harry Potter
line: Strange, sir?

name: Elphias Doge
line: It was the owls themselves.  They often arrived in distress.  It was clear they'd traveled great distances in some cases.

name: Harry Potter
line: Could you tell me from where they'd come, sir?

name: Elphias Doge
line: I'm afraid not.  Albus' messages mostly referenced our days together as schoolboys.  They were surprisingly intimate.  When he did speak of his current activities his words would turn elliptical.  Still, I sensed he was under great stress.  Why do you ask?

name: Harry Potter
line: Just curious.  I was... close to Professor Dumbledore.

name: Elphias Doge
line: Well, he treasured you, Mr. Potter, I can attest to that.  I can also tell you that when a person passes, it's only natural to rue the things left unsaid, to regret the question never asked. I knew Albus nigh on 100 years, but in many ways he will always remain a riddle even to me.

name: Woman
line: Don't despair, Elphias.  I'm told he's been thoroughly unriddled by Rita Skeeter.  In 800 pages no less.

name: Elphias Doge
line: That woman is a vulture, Muriel, and you well know it.

name: Muriel
line: Someone has to pick the bones to get at the truth.  I read your obituary, Elphias.  Lovely.  But you did skate over some of the sticky patches in Dumbledore's life.

name: Elphias Doge
line: I'm sorry you think so, Muriel.  I assure you I was writing from the heart.

name: Muriel
line: Yes, well, Rita Skeeter hasn't made that mistake, I'm sure.  Word has it someone talked to her, someone who knew the Dumbledore family well.  You and I both know who that is, Elphias.

name: Elphias Doge
line: A monstrous betrayal.  I can only conclude the rumors are true and that she has become untethered.

name: Harry Potter
line: Who are you talking about?

name: Muriel
line: Well, I don't suppose it'll be a secret once the book comes out. Bathilda Bagshot.

name: Harry Potter
line: Who?

name: Muriel
line: Who? Bathilda Bagshot!  My god, boy, she's only the most celebrated magical historian of the last century.  Don't they read History of Magic at Hogwarts anymore?

name: Harry Potter
line: Oh, right.  Slipped my mind...

name: Muriel
line: She knew the Dumbledores as well as anyone.  She'd have letters, perhaps an interesting photograph or two.  I'm sure Rita Skeeter would have thought it well worth a trip to Godric's Hollow to take a peek into that old bird's rattled cage.

name: Harry Potter
line: Godric's Hollow?  Bathilda Bagshot lives in Godric's Hollow?

name: Muriel
line: For years now.  That's where she first met Dumbledore.

name: Harry Potter
line: Excuse me?  You don't mean to say Dumbledore lived there too?

name: Muriel
line: Of course.  The family moved there after his father killed those three Muggles.  It was quite the scandal. Honestly, my boy, are you sure you knew him at all?

name: Patronus
line: The Ministry has fallen.  The Minister of Magic is dead.  They are coming...

name: Elphias Doge
line: Nice meeting you, Mr. Potter!

name: Hermione Granger
line: Ron!  Ron!

name: Remus Lupin
line: Harry!  Go!  Go!

name: Ron Weasley
line: Where are we?

name: Hermione Granger
line: Shaftesbury Avenue.  I used to come here to the theater with my mum and dad.  Just popped into my head.  I don't know why...

name: Hermione Granger
line: This way!

name: Hermione Granger
line: We need to change.

name: Ron Weasley
line: How the ruddy --

name: Hermione Granger
line: Undetectable Extension Charm.

A few teachers had always protected him, but they couldn't anymore.  After he left, he traveled for awhile, then ended up in Godric's Hollow where his great aunt lived, Bathilda Bagshot.

Dumbledore's mother had just died, Grindelwald was troubled and they were both brilliant -- they'd never really had anyone they could talk to on the same level.
